14. ç±»

RanåŸåˆ›2025/7/31...å¤§çº¦ 108 åˆ†é’Ÿ

1. é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡

å°†ç¨‹åºä»»åŠ¡æ¶‰åŠåˆ°çš„äº‹ç‰©æŠ½è±¡ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªä¸ªçš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä»¥è¿™äº›å¯¹è±¡ä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒæ¥å†™ç¨‹åºã€‚

1.1 ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ç±»ï¼Ÿ

ç±» å’Œ å®ä¾‹

ç‰©ä»¥ç±»èšï¼Œäººä»¥ç¾¤åˆ†

  • ç‹—æ˜¯ä¸€ç±»åŠ¨ç‰©ï¼Œå…·æœ‰ç›¸åŒã€ç›¸ä¼¼å±æ€§ã€‚ï¼ˆç±»ï¼‰
  • ä¸¤åªç‹—ï¼ŒåŠæ–¤å’Œå…«ä¸¤ï¼Œå‡ºç”Ÿåä¸ä¼šäº’ç›¸å½±å“ï¼Œå½¼æ­¤æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹çš„ä¸ªä½“ã€‚ï¼ˆå®ä¾‹ï¼‰
  • å½“ç±»æ”¹å˜çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå®ä¾‹ä¹Ÿä¼šå—åˆ°å½±å“ï¼›ä½†å®ä¾‹æ”¹å˜æ—¶ï¼Œä¸ä¼šå½±å“å…¶ä»–å®ä¾‹æˆ–è€…æ•´ä¸ªç±»ã€‚

1.2 å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½ æ‰¾åˆ°äº†å—ï¼Ÿ

  1. ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€æ®µé”™è¯¯ä»£ç ï¼Œdog_x å’Œ cat_x åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ç‹—å’ŒçŒ«çš„ä½ç½®åæ ‡ï¼Œåœ¨æ£€æµ‹åˆ°ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥ä¸º â€œmoveâ€ æ—¶ï¼Œè®©çŒ«å’Œç‹—éƒ½å‰è¿› 10 çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚

åŸä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œè¯·ä¿®æ”¹ï¼š

dog_x = 0
cat_x = 0

def dog_move():
    dog_x = dog_x + 10

def cat_move():
    cat_x = cat_x + 10

user_input = input()

if user_input == 'move':
    dog_move()
    cat_move()

ä¸ªäººä¿®æ”¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

dog_x = 0
cat_x = 0

def dog_move():
    global dog_x
    dog_x = dog_x + 10
    return dog_x

def cat_move():
    global cat_x
    cat_x = cat_x + 10
    return cat_x

user_input = input()

if user_input == 'move':
    print('dog:{}, cat:{}'.format(dog_x, cat_x))
    dog_move()
    cat_move()
    print('dog:{}, cat:{}'.format(dog_x, cat_x))

å¤ç›˜ï¼š

  • ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦åŠ ä¸Š globalï¼Ÿå› ä¸º dog_x æ˜¯å…¨å±€å˜é‡ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸åŠ ä¸Š globalï¼Œå‡½æ•°å†…çš„ dog_x ä¼šè¢«è§†ä¸ºå±€éƒ¨å˜é‡ï¼Œæ— æ³•ä¿®æ”¹å…¨å±€å˜é‡çš„å€¼ã€‚
  • return å¯ä»¥ä¸åŠ ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå·²ç»å£°æ˜ä¸ºå…¨å±€å˜é‡äº†ï¼Œåé¢è¾“å‡ºå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚
  1. ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯å¦ä¸€ä½åŒå­¦çš„é”™è¯¯ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œè¯·æ‰¾å‡ºé”™è¯¯ï¼š
def dog_move():
    dog_x = 0
    dog_x = dog_x + 10


def cat_move():
    cat_x = 0
    cat_x = cat_x + 10


user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ä»¤:')

if user_input == 'move':
    print('dog:{}, cat:{}'.format(dog_x, cat_x))
    dog_move()
    cat_move()
    print('dog:{}, cat:{}'.format(dog_x, cat_x))

é”™è¯¯ä¸€ï¼šå±€éƒ¨å˜é‡åœ¨å‡½æ•°å¤–ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ï¼›

é”™è¯¯äºŒï¼šæ¯æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°ï¼Œdog_x å’Œ cat_x éƒ½ä¼šè¢«é‡ç½®ä¸º 0ï¼Œå› æ­¤æ¯æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºç»“æœéƒ½æ˜¯ 10ï¼Œä¸€ç›´åœ¨åŸåœ°è¸æ­¥ã€‚

  1. ç°åœ¨ï¼Œé™¤äº†çŒ«å’Œç‹—ï¼Œè¿˜è¦åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§è±¡ï¼Œè®©å®ƒä¹ŸåƒçŒ«ç‹—ä¸€æ ·å‰è¿› 10ã€‚æ³¨æ„ï¼šä¸è¦æœºæ¢°çš„å†™ä»£ç ï¼Œè¦å¥½å¥½æ„Ÿå—ä¸€ä¸‹å†™ä»£ç çš„æ—¶å€™æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆæƒ…ç»ªï¼Œè¿™å¯¹åç»­å¯¹è±¡çš„ç†è§£æœ‰å¸®åŠ©ã€‚

æ„Ÿå—ï¼šç±»ä¼¼çš„ä¸œè¥¿åœ¨é‡å¤æ·»åŠ ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸Šé¢å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸‰ä¸ªç›¸ä¼¼çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼ŒåŠŸèƒ½ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œåªæ˜¯å˜é‡ åç§°ä¸ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œæ²¡å¿…è¦åˆ›é€ è¿™ä¹ˆå¤šå‡½æ•°ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šç¨‹åºæ³¨å†Œæ–°ç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç”¨æˆ·åã€æ‰‹æœºå·ã€å¯†ç ï¼Œé‚£æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯è¦ä¸ºæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·éƒ½åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æ¥å‚¨å­˜å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

# æˆ‘ä»¬ç°åœ¨æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·è¦æ³¨å†Œï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·éƒ½è¦å¡«å†™ç”¨æˆ·åã€æ‰‹æœºå·ã€å¯†ç 
# å¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸ä¼˜åŒ–ä»£ç ï¼Œé‚£å¯èƒ½ä¼šåƒä¸‹é¢è¿™æ ·å†™ï¼š

def register_user1():
    username1 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·1çš„ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š")
    phone1 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·1çš„æ‰‹æœºå·ï¼š")
    password1 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·1çš„å¯†ç ï¼š")
    print("ç”¨æˆ·1æ³¨å†ŒæˆåŠŸï¼ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š{}ï¼Œæ‰‹æœºå·ï¼š{}".format(username1, phone1))


def register_user2():
    username2 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·2çš„ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š")
    phone2 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·2çš„æ‰‹æœºå·ï¼š")
    password2 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·2çš„å¯†ç ï¼š")
    print("ç”¨æˆ·2æ³¨å†ŒæˆåŠŸï¼ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š{}ï¼Œæ‰‹æœºå·ï¼š{}".format(username2, phone2))


def register_user3():
    username3 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·3çš„ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š")
    phone3 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·3çš„æ‰‹æœºå·ï¼š")
    password3 = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·3çš„å¯†ç ï¼š")
    print("ç”¨æˆ·3æ³¨å†ŒæˆåŠŸï¼ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š{}ï¼Œæ‰‹æœºå·ï¼š{}".format(username3, phone3))


# ç°åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬è¦ä¾æ¬¡æ³¨å†Œè¿™ä¸‰ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·
register_user1()
register_user2()
register_user3()

2. ä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ï¼šé¢å‘å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•

2.1 é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡ä»£ç æ¡†æ¶

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¦ä½¿ç”¨é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°å‰é¢åŠ¨ç‰©å¬åˆ°ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ä»¤ move å°±å¾€å‰è·‘çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

class Animal():
    def __init__(self):
        self.x = 0
        
    def move(self):
        self.x = self.x + 10

dog = Animal()
cat = Animal()

user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ä»¤ï¼š')

if user_input == 'move':
    dog.move()
    cat.move()
    print('Dog position:', dog.x)
    print('Cat position:', cat.x)

ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç åŒ…å«å‡ ä¸ªå†…å®¹ï¼š

  • ç±»ï¼šä¸€ç¾¤æœ‰ç›¸ä¼¼æ€§çš„äº‹ç‰©çš„é›†åˆï¼Œå¯¹åº” Python é‡Œçš„ class
  • å¯¹è±¡ï¼šé›†åˆä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªäº‹ç‰©ï¼Œå¯¹åº” class é‡Œç”Ÿæˆçš„ä¸€ä¸ª objectï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ä»£ç ä¸­çš„ dog å’Œ catã€‚ï¼ˆå…¶å®å°±æ˜¯ä¸Šæ–‡æåˆ°çš„å®ä¾‹ï¼‰
  • å±æ€§ï¼šå¯¹è±¡çš„æŸä¸ªé™æ€ç‰¹å¾ï¼Œæ˜¯è‡ªèº«æºå¸¦çš„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ä»£ç ä¸­çš„ x
  • å‡½æ•°ï¼šå¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆå®ä¾‹ï¼‰çš„æŸä¸ªåŠ¨æ€èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç ä¸­çš„ move() å‡½æ•°ã€‚

2.2 _ _ init_ _(self) å‡½æ•°

è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°

class Animal():
    def __init__(self):                # åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ç”Ÿæˆæ—¶ä¼šè¢«è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°
        self.x = 0

éªŒè¯çš„ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

class Animal():
    def __init__(self):
        print('init function called')
        
dog = Animal()

#-------output-------
init function called

ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰è°ƒç”¨ _ _init_ _() è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å°† dog å®šä¹‰åœ¨ Animal è¿™ä¸ªç±»åˆ«é‡Œçš„æ—¶å€™è‡ªåŠ¨è¿è¡Œäº†è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå³è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚ç±»ä¼¼äºä¸€å‡ºç”Ÿå°±è‡ªå¸¦çš„å¤©èµ‹æŠ€èƒ½ã€‚

ä¾‹å­ä¸€ï¼šåˆ›å»ºæ¸¸æˆè§’è‰²ã€‚

æ¯ä¸ªè§’è‰²ä¸€å‡ºç”Ÿå°±ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨æ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€äº›å¤©èµ‹æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œè¿™äº›æŠ€èƒ½ä¸æ˜¯æ‰‹åŠ¨æ·»åŠ çš„ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯è§’è‰²ä¸€å‡ºç”Ÿç³»ç»Ÿå°±å¸®ä½ å‡†å¤‡å¥½äº†ã€‚

class GameCharacter():
    def __init__(self):
        print('è§’è‰²å·²åˆ›å»ºï¼Œå¤©èµ‹æŠ€èƒ½å·²æ¿€æ´»ï¼')

hero = GameCharacter()

#-------output-------
è§’è‰²å·²åˆ›å»ºï¼Œå¤©èµ‹æŠ€èƒ½å·²æ¿€æ´»ï¼

ä¾‹å­äºŒï¼š

å°±åƒæˆ‘ä»¬äººç±»åœ¨ä¸€è¯ç”Ÿçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ²¡äººæ•™æˆ‘ä»¬æ€ä¹ˆå‘¼å¸ã€æ€ä¹ˆè®©å¿ƒè„è·³åŠ¨â€”â€”è¿™äº›èƒ½åŠ›æ˜¯ä¸ç”Ÿä¿±æ¥çš„ï¼Œæ˜¯â€œå‡ºç”Ÿé‚£ä¸€åˆ»å°±è‡ªåŠ¨å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œâ€çš„ã€‚Python ä¸­çš„ init æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆå‡½æ•°ï¼‰ï¼Œå°±åƒâ€œå‘¼å¸â€å’Œâ€œå¿ƒè·³â€ä¸€æ ·ã€‚å½“æˆ‘ä»¬åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆç”Ÿå‘½ã€å®ä¾‹åŒ–ï¼‰æ—¶ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰‹åŠ¨å»è°ƒç”¨ã€‚

class Human():
    def __init__(self):
        print('ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°ç”Ÿå‘½è¯ç”Ÿäº†ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨è‡ªåŠ¨å¯åŠ¨å‘¼å¸å’Œå¿ƒè·³ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚')

baby = Human()

#-------output-------
ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°ç”Ÿå‘½è¯ç”Ÿäº†ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨è‡ªåŠ¨å¯åŠ¨å‘¼å¸å’Œå¿ƒè·³ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚

2.3 move(self) å‡½æ•°

move(self) å‡½æ•°å°±æ˜¯å’Œæˆ‘ä»¬å‰é¢å°†çš„åŸºæœ¬å‡½æ•°çš„æ„æ€ã€åŠŸèƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ã€‚

åªä¸è¿‡è¿™é‡Œé¢æ˜¯å±äºç±»é‡Œé¢çš„åŠŸèƒ½å‡½æ•°ã€‚

2.4 ç±»å½“ä¸­çš„ self

2.4.1 éæ­£å¼è®²è§£1

class Animal():
    def __init__(self):
        self.x = 0
        
    def move(self):
        self.x = self.x + 10

dog = Animal()

if user_input == 'move':
    dog.move()
print('Dog position:', dog.x)

self æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯æœ¬èº«ï¼Œåœ¨ Animal() å†…éƒ¨ï¼ŒæŒ‡çš„å°±æ˜¯ Animal() ï¼Œå½“æŠŠ Animal() èµ‹å€¼ç»™ dog æ—¶ï¼Œdog = Animal = self ã€‚

å› æ­¤ï¼š

  • self.x â†’ Animal().x â†’ dog.x ï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿå°±è§£é‡Šäº† dog.x å¯ä»¥ä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡è¾“å‡ºã€‚
  • è¦è°ƒç”¨ Animal() é‡Œçš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ˜¯ Animal().move() ï¼Œåˆå› ä¸ºä¸Šè¿°çš„ç­‰ä»·åŸå› ï¼Œ Animal().move() = dog.move() ã€‚
  • ç±»é‡Œé¢çš„æ¯ä¸ªå‡½æ•°éƒ½è¦åŠ ä¸Š self ï¼Œä»£è¡¨éƒ½å±äºç±»çš„ä¸€å‘˜ï¼Œå¦‚åŒå®¶æ—çš„æ—å¾½ï¼Œä»£è¡¨éƒ½å±äºå®¶æ—çš„ä¸€å‘˜ã€‚
  • æœ‰äº† self è¿™ä¸ªæ—å¾½ï¼Œæ„å‘³ç€å®¶æ—çš„èµ„æºéƒ½å¯ä»¥äº’ç›¸ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šå®¶æ—çš„ç™¾ä¸‡æ£‹ç›˜ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰å®¶æ—æˆå‘˜éƒ½å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯åŒä¸€å®¶æ—çš„å°±å¾—çœ‹æƒ…å†µäº†ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å½“ç±»é‡Œé¢å­˜åœ¨å˜é‡ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬å„ä¸ªå‡½æ•°çš„å˜é‡ï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨å˜é‡çš„å‰é¢åŠ ä¸Š self(self.x) ï¼Œåˆ™åœ¨ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰å‡½æ•°éƒ½å¯ä»¥éšæ—¶è°ƒç”¨å˜é‡ self.x ï¼Œåœ¨å‡½æ•°å†…å¤–éƒ½å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®ã€‚

æ³¨æ„ï¼š

  • åœ¨å¸¸è§„å‡½æ•°ä¸­ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå‡½æ•°éƒ½æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹çš„ã€‚å‡½æ•°å’Œå‡½æ•°ä¹‹é—´çš„å˜é‡ï¼Œä¸èƒ½äº’ç›¸è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œé™¤éä½¿ç”¨å…¨å±€å˜é‡ global æ¥è§£å†³ã€‚
  • åœ¨ç±»ä¸­çš„å‡½æ•°åŒç†ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹çš„ï¼Œå‡½æ•°ä¸å‡½æ•°ä¹‹é—´çš„å˜é‡ä¾ç„¶ä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥å…±æœ‰ï¼Œéœ€è¦å€ŸåŠ© self æ¥å®ç°ç±»é‡Œé¢çš„å‡½æ•°å˜é‡å…±ç”¨ã€‚

è¿™é‡Œç»™å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰ä½¿ç”¨ self åˆ›å»ºå˜é‡ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´æ— æ³•ç›¸äº’è°ƒç”¨çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼š

class Demo():
    def function1(self):
        string = 'Hello World'
        print(string)
        
    def function2(self):
        print(string)

demo = Demo()
demo.function1()
demo.function2()     # æ­¤å¤„ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ name 'string' is not defined

ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç åŠ ä¸Š self å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ï¼š

class Demo():
    def function1(self):
        self.string = 'Hello World'
        print(self.string)

    def function2(self):
        print(self.string)

demo = Demo()
demo.function1()
demo.function2()  

#-------output-------
Hello World
Hello World

2.4.2 éæ­£å¼è®²è§£2

**æ³¨æ„ï¼š **

åœ¨ç±»é‡Œé¢çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°éƒ½å¿…é¡»å†™ self !

2.4.3 æ­£å¼è®²è§£ï¼šä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ self ï¼Ÿ

2.4.4 self å­˜åœ¨çš„æ„ä¹‰

  • åŸå› ä¸€ï¼šä»£è¡¨è‡ªå·±
  • åŸå› äºŒï¼šèµ„æºå…±äº«ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰ self ä¸èƒ½å®ç°èµ„æºå…±äº«ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œdog å’Œ self å®é™…ä¸ºåŒä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡ï¼š

class Animal():
    def __init__(self):
        self.x = 0
        print(f'self address: {self}')

dog = Animal()
print(f'dog address: {dog}')

#-------output-------
self address: <__main__.Animal object at 0x000001FB0AC48F40>
dog address: <__main__.Animal object at 0x000001FB0AC48F40>

2.5 _ _init_ _ åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•°

2.5.1èƒŒæ™¯

ç±»ä¼¼å®å®å‡ºç”Ÿå‰æƒ³åå­—

class Baby():
    def __init__(self, name):
        """
        åˆå§‹åŒ–å®å®å¯¹è±¡æ—¶ï¼Œå¿…é¡»æä¾›åå­—ï¼Œ
        å°±åƒæ˜¯å¤§äººæå‰ä¸ºå®å®å–å¥½åå­—ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨å¿…è¦æ—¶åŠç†å‡ºç”Ÿè¯æ˜ã€‚
        """

        self.name = name    # å®å®çš„åå­—ï¼Œç›¸å½“äºå‡ºç”Ÿè¯æ˜ä¸­çš„åå­—

    def introduce(self):
        """
        å®å®çš„è‡ªæˆ‘ä»‹ç»ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºåˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶è®¾ç½®çš„å±æ€§
        """

        print(f'å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«{self.name}')

# å®å®å‡ºç”Ÿå‰ï¼Œå¤§äººä¸ºå…¶å–å¥½äº†åå­—
baby1 = Baby(name='æ£ æ£ ')    # å®ä¾‹åŒ–
baby1.introduce()           # è¾“å‡ºä»‹ç»

#-------output-------
å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«æ£ æ£ 

_ _init_ _ å‡½æ•°çš„æ‰€æœ‰å‚æ•°ï¼Œå…¨éƒ¨åœ¨ç±»çš„å®ä¾‹åŒ–æ—¶ä¼ å…¥ã€‚å³ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç ä¸­çš„ baby1 = Baby(name='æ£ æ£ ') ã€‚

2.5.2 ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦å†™ self.XXX = XXX ï¼ŸèƒŒåå‘ç”Ÿäº†ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ

é—®é¢˜ä¸€ï¼šä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¼ è¿›å‚æ•° nameï¼Œè¿˜è¦æŠŠ name èµ‹å€¼ç»™ self.name

é—®é¢˜äºŒï¼šä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¸ç›´æ¥ name = name ï¼Œè¿˜è¦ç”¨ self

é—®é¢˜ä¸‰ï¼šä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆâ€œç‚¹â€åé¢çš„å˜é‡åç§°å’Œå‚æ•°åŒåï¼Œä¸åŒåå¯ä»¥å—ï¼Ÿ

å›ç­”ä¸€ï¼šä»å¤–é¢å¼•å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªåœ°æ–¹å­˜æ”¾ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ self.name = name è¿›è¡Œå­˜æ”¾ã€‚

å›ç­”äºŒï¼šå¹¶ä¸”ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°éœ€è¦åœ¨ç±»å†…çš„å‡½æ•°é—´å…±ç”¨ï¼Œå› æ­¤éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªåœ°æ–¹æ¥å­˜æ”¾è¿™ä¸ªå…±ç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åŠ ä¸Š self ä½¿å…¶èƒ½å…±ç”¨

å›ç­”ä¸‰ï¼šå«å…¶ä»–å˜é‡åå¯ä»¥ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æœ¬èº«å˜é‡åæ˜¯â€œè§åçŸ¥æ„â€ï¼Œä¸”æŒ‡ä»£çš„æ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸éœ€è¦å†æƒ³ä¸€ä¸ªåˆé€‚çš„å˜é‡åã€‚ç¤ºä¾‹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

class Baby():
    def __init__(self, name):

        self.name = name
        self.username = name
        print(f'init name: {self.name}, username: {self.username}')
    
baby1 = Baby('æ£ æ£ ')

#-------output-------
init name: æ£ æ£ , username: æ£ æ£ 

å°ç»“ï¼š

2.5.3 å‚æ•°è®¾å®šåå¿…é¡»ä¼ å…¥

åœ¨åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœè®¾å®šäº†å‚æ•°ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°†ç±»å®ä¾‹åŒ–æ—¶å¿…é¡»å°†è¯¥å‚æ•°ä¼ å…¥ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ã€‚

class Baby():
    def __init__(self, name):

        self.name = name
        self.username = name
        print(f'init name: {self.name}, username: {self.username}')

baby1 = Baby()

#-------output-------
TypeError: __init__() missing 1 required positional argument: 'name'

2.5.4 ä¼ å…¥å¤šä¸ªå‚æ•°

class Baby():
    def __init__(self, name, gender):

        self.name = name
        self.gender = gender

    def introduce(self):
        print(f'å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å« {self.name}, æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª{self.gender}å®å®ã€‚')

baby1 = Baby(name = 'æ£ æ£ ', gender = 'å¥³')
baby1.introduce()

baby2 = Baby('é”¦å¥•', 'ç”·')
baby2.introduce()

#-------output-------
å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å« æ£ æ£ , æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¥³å®å®ã€‚
å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å« é”¦å¥•, æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”·å®å®ã€‚

2.5.5 è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤å€¼

class Baby():
    def __init__(self, name = 'å°æ‚¦', gender = 'ç”·'):
        print(f'å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«{name}, æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª{gender}å®å®ã€‚')

baby1 = Baby()

#-------output-------
å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«å°æ‚¦, æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”·å®å®ã€‚

è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤å€¼çš„è¦æ±‚å’Œå‡½æ•°ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œä¸€æ—¦è®¾ç½®äº†é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼Œåé¢å°±å¿…é¡»éƒ½è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ã€‚

é»˜è®¤å€¼ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®ä¸º None ï¼Œå…·ä½“å¦‚ä½•è®¾ç½®è¦çœ‹ä½¿ç”¨éœ€æ±‚ã€‚

ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç å¯ä»¥è¿›ä¸€æ­¥ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼š

class Baby():
    def __init__(self, name, gender = None):

        self.name = name
        self.gender = gender

    def introduce(self):
        if self.gender:
            print(f'å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«{self.name}ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª{self.gender}å®å®ã€‚')
        else:
            print(f'å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«{self.name}ï¼Œæ€§åˆ«å¾…å®šã€‚')

baby1 = Baby(name = 'æ£ æ£ ', gender = 'å¥³')
baby1.introduce()

baby2 = Baby('é”¦å¥•', 'ç”·')
baby2.introduce()

baby3 = Baby(name = 'å®å®')
baby3.introduce()

#-------output-------
å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«æ£ æ£ ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¥³å®å®ã€‚
å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«é”¦å¥•ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”·å®å®ã€‚
å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å«å®å®ï¼Œæ€§åˆ«å¾…å®šã€‚

2.6 ç±»å®ä¾‹åŒ–æ—¶ï¼šæŒ‡å®šä¼ å‚å’Œä½ç½®ä¼ å‚

ç±»çš„ä¼ å…¥çš„ä¸‰ç§åŸåˆ™ï¼š

  1. å…¨éƒ¨ä¸æŒ‡å®šå‚æ•°

    baby1 = Baby('æ£ æ£ ', 'å¥³')

  2. å…¨éƒ¨æŒ‡å®šå‚æ•°

    baby1 = Baby(name = 'æ£ æ£ ', gender = 'å¥³')

  3. éƒ¨åˆ†æŒ‡å®šå‚æ•°ï¼Œåªèƒ½ä»å‰é¢ä¸æŒ‡å®šï¼Œä¸€æ—¦å¼€å§‹æŒ‡å®šï¼Œåç»­å‚æ•°éƒ½è¦æŒ‡å®šï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ã€‚

    baby1 = Baby('æ£ æ£ ', gender = 'å¥³')

    ä¸‹è¿°æƒ…å†µä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼š

    baby1 = Baby(name = 'æ£ æ£ ', 'å¥³')

  4. å‚æ•°ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å˜é‡ä¼ é€’è¿›å»

    name = input("Enter your name: ")
gender = input("Enter your gender: ")
age = input("Enter your age: ")
weight = input("Enter your weight: ")
baby1 = Baby(name, gender, age, weight)
baby2 = Baby(name=name, gender=gender, age=age, weight=weight)

    baby2 é‡Œé¢ï¼Œ= å·¦é¢æ˜¯ç±»å†…åŒ…å«çš„å˜é‡åï¼Œ= å³é¢æ˜¯ä½œä¸ºå˜é‡åï¼Œé€šè¿‡æŒ‡å®šçš„æ–¹å¼ä¼ å…¥åˆ°é‡Œé¢ï¼Œä¸¤è€…é•¿çš„ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œå…¶å®æ˜¯ä¸åŒçš„ã€‚

3. å°è¯•ç‰›åˆ€

3.1 å® ç‰©ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ

é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚ï¼š è¯·ä½ ç”¨é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹å¼ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªå® ç‰©ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿçš„é›å½¢ï¼Œå®Œæˆä»¥ä¸‹åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

  1. åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç±» Pet
    • å±æ€§ï¼š
      • nameï¼ˆå® ç‰©åå­—ï¼Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼‰
      • ageï¼ˆå® ç‰©å¹´é¾„ï¼Œæ•´æ•°ï¼‰
      • speciesï¼ˆå® ç‰©ç§ç±»ï¼Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚â€œç‹—â€ã€â€œçŒ«â€ï¼‰
    • æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
      • show_info()ï¼šæ‰“å°å® ç‰©çš„åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ ¼å¼è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼‰ã€‚
      • birthday()ï¼šå® ç‰©è¿‡ç”Ÿæ—¥ï¼Œå¹´é¾„åŠ  1ï¼Œå¹¶æ‰“å°â€œxxx è¿‡ç”Ÿæ—¥å•¦ï¼Œç°åœ¨ xxx å²äº†ï¼â€
  2. ç¼–å†™ä¸»ç¨‹åº
    • åˆ›å»º 2 ä¸ªä¸åŒçš„å® ç‰©å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆå±æ€§ä¸åŒï¼‰
    • åˆ†åˆ«è°ƒç”¨ show_info() æ–¹æ³•å±•ç¤ºå®ƒä»¬çš„åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
    • ç»™å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå® ç‰©è°ƒç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡ birthday() æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶å†æ¬¡å±•ç¤ºå®ƒçš„ä¿¡æ¯

è¿è¡Œç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆä»…ä¾›å‚è€ƒï¼‰ï¼š

å°ç™½ è¿™åªç‹—ä»Šå¹´ 2 å²ã€‚
å°é»‘ è¿™åªçŒ«ä»Šå¹´ 3 å²ã€‚
å°ç™½ è¿‡ç”Ÿæ—¥å•¦ï¼Œç°åœ¨ 3 å²äº†ï¼
å°ç™½ è¿™åªç‹—ä»Šå¹´ 3 å²ã€‚
å°é»‘ è¿™åªçŒ«ä»Šå¹´ 3 å²ã€‚

å›ç­”ï¼š

class Pet():
    def __init__(self,name,age, species):
        self.name = name
        self.age = age
        self.species = species

    def show_info(self):
        print(f'Pet Info: å§“å: {self.name}, å¹´é¾„: {self.age}, ç§æ—: {self.species}')

    def birthday(self):
        self.age += 1
        print(f'{self.name}è¿‡ç”Ÿæ—¥å•¦ï¼ä»Šå¹´{self.age}å²äº†~')


cat = Pet('é˜¿å°”æ³•', 6, 'cat')
cat.show_info()
cat.birthday()

dog = Pet('åŠæ–¤', 1, 'dog')
dog.show_info()
dog.birthday()

#-------output-------
Pet Info: å§“å: é˜¿å°”æ³•, å¹´é¾„: 6, ç§æ—: cat
é˜¿å°”æ³•è¿‡ç”Ÿæ—¥å•¦ï¼ä»Šå¹´7å²äº†~
Pet Info: å§“å: åŠæ–¤, å¹´é¾„: 1, ç§æ—: dog
åŠæ–¤è¿‡ç”Ÿæ—¥å•¦ï¼ä»Šå¹´2å²äº†~

3.2 é“¶è¡Œè´¦æˆ·ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ

é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚ï¼š è¯·ä½ ä½¿ç”¨é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„é“¶è¡Œè´¦æˆ·ç±»ï¼Œå®Œæˆä»¥ä¸‹åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

  1. åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç±» BankAccount
    • å±æ€§ï¼š
      • ownerï¼ˆè´¦æˆ·æŒæœ‰äººå§“åï¼Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼‰
      • balanceï¼ˆè´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ï¼Œæµ®ç‚¹æ•°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ 0ï¼‰
    • æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
      • show_balance()ï¼šæ‰“å°å½“å‰è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ã€‚
      • deposit(amount)ï¼šå­˜é’±åˆ°è´¦æˆ·ï¼Œé‡‘é¢å¿…é¡»å¤§äº 0ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æç¤ºâ€œå­˜æ¬¾é‡‘é¢å¿…é¡»å¤§äº 0â€ã€‚
      • withdraw(amount)ï¼šå–é’±ï¼Œé‡‘é¢å¿…é¡»å¤§äº 0 ä¸”ä¸èƒ½è¶…è¿‡å½“å‰ä½™é¢ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æç¤ºâ€œä½™é¢ä¸è¶³æˆ–é‡‘é¢æ— æ•ˆâ€ã€‚
  2. ä¸»ç¨‹åº
    • åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè´¦æˆ·å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆå§“åè‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼Œåˆå§‹ä½™é¢å¯ä»¥ä¸º 0ï¼‰ã€‚
    • è¿›è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡å­˜æ¬¾æ“ä½œï¼ˆé‡‘é¢è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼‰ã€‚
    • è¿›è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡å–æ¬¾æ“ä½œï¼ˆé‡‘é¢è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼‰ã€‚
    • æœ€åæ˜¾ç¤ºè´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ã€‚

è¿è¡Œç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆä»…ä¾›å‚è€ƒï¼‰ï¼š

è´¦æˆ·æŒæœ‰äººï¼šå¼ ä¸‰
å½“å‰ä½™é¢ï¼šï¿¥0.0
å­˜å…¥ ï¿¥1000.0 æˆåŠŸï¼
å½“å‰ä½™é¢ï¼šï¿¥1000.0
å–å‡º ï¿¥500.0 æˆåŠŸï¼
å½“å‰ä½™é¢ï¼šï¿¥500.0

å›ç­”ï¼š

class BankAccount():
    def __init__(self, name, balance = 0.00):
        self.name = name
        self.balance = balance

    def show_balance(self):
        print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å½“å‰ä½™é¢ä¸º{self.balance}ã€‚')

    def deposit(self, amount):
        if amount <= 0:
            print('å­˜æ¬¾é‡‘é¢å¿…é¡»å¤§äº0')
        else:
            self.balance += amount
            print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å·²å­˜å…¥{amount}å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢{self.balance}å…ƒã€‚')
    def withdraw(self, amount):
        if amount >0 and amount <= self.balance:                 # å¯ä»¥å†™æˆ 0<amount<=self.balance
            self.balance -= amount
            print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å–å‡º{amount}å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢{self.balance}å…ƒã€‚')
        else:
            print('ä½™é¢ä¸è¶³æˆ–å–æ¬¾é‡‘é¢æ— æ•ˆ')

 # åˆ›å»ºå¼ ä¸‰çš„è´¦æˆ·
Zhangsan = BankAccount('å¼ ä¸‰')
Zhangsan.show_balance()

# å­˜å…¥1000å…ƒ
Zhangsan.deposit(1000)

# å–å‡º100å…ƒ
Zhangsan.withdraw(100)

# æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€åä½™é¢
Zhangsan.show_balance()

#-------output-------
å¼ ä¸‰çš„è´¦æˆ·å½“å‰ä½™é¢ä¸º0.0ã€‚
å¼ ä¸‰çš„è´¦æˆ·å·²å­˜å…¥1000å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢1000.0å…ƒã€‚
å¼ ä¸‰çš„è´¦æˆ·å–å‡º100å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢900.0å…ƒã€‚
å¼ ä¸‰çš„è´¦æˆ·å½“å‰ä½™é¢ä¸º900.0ã€‚

3.3 é¢˜ç›®ï¼šäº¤äº’å¼é“¶è¡Œè´¦æˆ·ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ˆæ‰©å±•ç‰ˆï¼‰

é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚ï¼š åœ¨ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ª BankAccount ç±»çš„åŸºç¡€ä¸Šï¼Œç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªäº¤äº’å¼æ§åˆ¶å°ç¨‹åºï¼Œè®©ç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥è‡ªå·±è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ä»¤å®Œæˆå­˜æ¬¾ã€å–æ¬¾ã€æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢ã€é€€å‡ºç³»ç»Ÿç­‰æ“ä½œã€‚

  1. ç±» BankAccountï¼ˆå’Œä¹‹å‰åŸºæœ¬ä¸€æ ·ï¼‰ï¼š

    • ownerï¼ˆè´¦æˆ·æŒæœ‰äººå§“åï¼‰
    • balanceï¼ˆè´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ 0ï¼‰
    • show_balance()ï¼šæ˜¾ç¤ºä½™é¢
    • deposit(amount)ï¼šå­˜æ¬¾
    • withdraw(amount)ï¼šå–æ¬¾

  2. ä¸»ç¨‹åºäº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

    • ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥è´¦æˆ·æŒæœ‰äººå§“åï¼ˆåˆ›å»ºè´¦æˆ·ï¼‰

    • è¿›å…¥å¾ªç¯èœå•ï¼š

      è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š
1. å­˜æ¬¾
2. å–æ¬¾
3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢
4. é€€å‡º

    • æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥çš„é€‰é¡¹æ‰§è¡Œå¯¹åº”åŠŸèƒ½

    • ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥ 4 æ—¶é€€å‡ºç³»ç»Ÿ

  3. è¿è¡Œç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆå‚è€ƒï¼‰ï¼š

    è¯·è¾“å…¥è´¦æˆ·æŒæœ‰äººå§“åï¼šå¼ ä¸‰
è´¦æˆ·å·²åˆ›å»ºï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢ä¸º ï¿¥0.0

è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š
1. å­˜æ¬¾
2. å–æ¬¾
3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢
4. é€€å‡º
è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰é¡¹ï¼š1
è¯·è¾“å…¥å­˜æ¬¾é‡‘é¢ï¼š1000
å­˜å…¥ ï¿¥1000.0 æˆåŠŸï¼

è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š
1. å­˜æ¬¾
2. å–æ¬¾
3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢
4. é€€å‡º
è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰é¡¹ï¼š3
è´¦æˆ·æŒæœ‰äººï¼šå¼ ä¸‰
å½“å‰ä½™é¢ï¼šï¿¥1000.0

å›ç­”ï¼š

ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸€ï¼š

class BankAccount():
    def __init__(self, name, balance = 0.00):
        self.name = name
        self.balance = balance

    def show_balance(self):
        print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å½“å‰ä½™é¢ä¸º{self.balance}ã€‚')

    def deposit(self, amount):
        if amount <= 0:
            print('å­˜æ¬¾é‡‘é¢å¿…é¡»å¤§äº0')
        else:
            self.balance += amount
            print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å·²å­˜å…¥{amount}å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢{self.balance}å…ƒã€‚')
    def withdraw(self, amount):
        if amount >0 and amount <= self.balance:                 # å¯ä»¥å†™æˆ 0<amount<=self.balance
            self.balance -= amount
            print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å–å‡º{amount}å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢{self.balance}å…ƒã€‚')
        else:
            print('ä½™é¢ä¸è¶³æˆ–å–æ¬¾é‡‘é¢æ— æ•ˆ')

# åˆ›å»ºè´¦æˆ·
name_input = input('è¯·è¾“å…¥è´¦æˆ·å§“åï¼š')

while name_input == 'å¼ ä¸‰':
    account1 = BankAccount(name_input)

    # æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºè¯­
    print()
    print('è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š')
    print('1. å­˜æ¬¾')
    print('2. å–æ¬¾')
    print('3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢')
    print('4. é€€å‡º')

    # è·å¾—ç”¨æˆ·æŒ‡ä»¤
    choice = input('è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰é¡¹ï¼š')
    if choice == '1':
        amount = float(input('è¯·è¾“å…¥å­˜æ¬¾é‡‘é¢ï¼š'))
        account1.deposit(amount)
    if choice == '2':
        amount = float(input('è¯·è¾“å…¥å–æ¬¾é‡‘é¢ï¼š'))
        account1.withdraw(amount)
    if choice == '3':
        account1.show_balance()
    if choice == '4':
        del account1
        print('è´¦æˆ·å·²é€€å‡ºã€‚')

é—®é¢˜ï¼šå­˜æ¬¾åä¿¡æ¯æ— æ³•ä¿ç•™

åŸå› ï¼šå­˜æ¬¾ä¹‹åï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ˜¯ while å¾ªç¯ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åˆå›åˆ°äº† line 26 é‚£é‡Œé‡æ–°åˆ›å»ºè´¦æˆ·ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ”¹åŠ¨æ— æ³•ç•™å­˜ã€‚

class BankAccount():
    def __init__(self, name, balance = 0.00):
        self.name = name
        self.balance = balance

    def show_balance(self):
        print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å½“å‰ä½™é¢ä¸º{self.balance}ã€‚')

    def deposit(self, amount):
        if amount <= 0:
            print('å­˜æ¬¾é‡‘é¢å¿…é¡»å¤§äº0')
        else:
            self.balance += amount
            print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å·²å­˜å…¥{amount}å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢{self.balance}å…ƒã€‚')
    def withdraw(self, amount):
        if amount >0 and amount <= self.balance:                 # å¯ä»¥å†™æˆ 0<amount<=self.balance
            self.balance -= amount
            print(f'{self.name}çš„è´¦æˆ·å–å‡º{amount}å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢{self.balance}å…ƒã€‚')
        else:
            print('ä½™é¢ä¸è¶³æˆ–å–æ¬¾é‡‘é¢æ— æ•ˆ')

# åˆ›å»ºè´¦æˆ·
name_input = input('è¯·è¾“å…¥è´¦æˆ·å§“åï¼š')
account1 = BankAccount(name_input)

while name_input:

    # æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºè¯­
    print()
    print('è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š')
    print('1. å­˜æ¬¾')
    print('2. å–æ¬¾')
    print('3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢')
    print('4. é€€å‡º')
# è·å¾—ç”¨æˆ·æŒ‡ä»¤
    choice = input('è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰é¡¹ï¼š')

    if choice == '1':
        amount = float(input('è¯·è¾“å…¥å­˜æ¬¾é‡‘é¢ï¼š'))
        account1.deposit(amount)
    if choice == '2':
        amount = float(input('è¯·è¾“å…¥å–æ¬¾é‡‘é¢ï¼š'))
        account1.withdraw(amount)
    if choice == '3':
        account1.show_balance()
    if choice == '4':
        print('è´¦æˆ·å·²é€€å‡ºã€‚')
        name_input = False

#-------output-------
è¯·è¾“å…¥è´¦æˆ·å§“åï¼šå¼ ä¸‰

è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š
1. å­˜æ¬¾
2. å–æ¬¾
3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢
4. é€€å‡º
è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰é¡¹ï¼š1
è¯·è¾“å…¥å­˜æ¬¾é‡‘é¢ï¼š1000
å¼ ä¸‰çš„è´¦æˆ·å·²å­˜å…¥1000.0å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢1000.0å…ƒã€‚

è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š
1. å­˜æ¬¾
2. å–æ¬¾
3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢
4. é€€å‡º
è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰é¡¹ï¼š2
è¯·è¾“å…¥å–æ¬¾é‡‘é¢ï¼š100
å¼ ä¸‰çš„è´¦æˆ·å–å‡º100.0å…ƒï¼Œå½“å‰ä½™é¢900.0å…ƒã€‚

è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š
1. å­˜æ¬¾
2. å–æ¬¾
3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢
4. é€€å‡º
è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰é¡¹ï¼š3
å¼ ä¸‰çš„è´¦æˆ·å½“å‰ä½™é¢ä¸º900.0ã€‚

è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œï¼š
1. å­˜æ¬¾
2. å–æ¬¾
3. æŸ¥çœ‹ä½™é¢
4. é€€å‡º
è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰é¡¹ï¼š4
è´¦æˆ·å·²é€€å‡ºã€‚

ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼šå°†å¤šä¸ª if è¿ç”¨æ”¹æˆ elif ï¼ŒèŠ‚çœåˆ¤æ–­æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå¤šä¸ª if éœ€è¦æ¯ä¸ªéƒ½åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ elif åˆ¤æ–­æˆç«‹åï¼Œåé¢çš„å°±ä¸ä¼šå†æ‰§è¡Œäº†ã€‚

å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

å¯ä»¥ç”¨ while True å’Œ break æ­é…ç»“æŸå¾ªç¯ã€‚

4. ç±»é‡Œé¢çš„å‡½æ•°ä¼ å…¥å‚æ•°

  1. ä¼ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°
class Dog:
    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name

    def bark(self, times):
        print(f'{self.name}æ±ª ' * times)

my_dog = Dog('å°é»‘')
my_dog.bark(3)

#-------output-------
å°é»‘æ±ª å°é»‘æ±ª å°é»‘æ±ª
  1. ä¼ å…¥å¤šä¸ªå‚æ•°
class Dog:
    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name

    def bark(self, times, newline):
        for _ in range(times):
            if newline:
                print(f'{self.name} æ±ª')
            else:
                print(f'{self.name} æ±ª ', end=' ')

my_dog = Dog('å°é»‘')

# è°ƒç”¨ bark å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¼ å…¥ä¸¤ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå«3æ¬¡ï¼Œå¹¶æ¯æ¬¡æ¢è¡Œ
print('æ¯æ¬¡æ¢è¡Œï¼š')
my_dog.bark(3, True)

# å«3æ¬¡ï¼Œä¸æ¢è¡Œ
print('\nä¸æ¢è¡Œï¼š ')
my_dog.bark(3, False)

#-------output-------
æ¯æ¬¡æ¢è¡Œï¼š
å°é»‘ æ±ª
å°é»‘ æ±ª
å°é»‘ æ±ª

ä¸æ¢è¡Œï¼š 
å°é»‘ æ±ª  å°é»‘ æ±ª  å°é»‘ æ±ª

5. é€šè¿‡å®ä¾‹åŒ–å¯¹è±¡æ”¹å±æ€§å€¼

ä¿®æ”¹å‰çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

class Person:
    def __init__(self, name, gender = None, age = None, weight = None):
        self.name = name
        self.gender = gender
        self.age = age
        self.weight = weight

    def introduce(self):
        intro = f'å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œ æˆ‘å« {self.name}ã€‚'
        if self.gender:
            if self.gender == 'ç”·':
                intro += 'æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”·å­©ã€‚'
            else:
                intro += 'æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¥³å­©ã€‚'
        else:
            intro += 'æˆ‘çš„æ€§åˆ«æš‚æ—¶ä¿å¯†å“¦~'
            
        if self.age:
            intro += f'æˆ‘ä»Šå¹´{self.age}å²äº†ã€‚'
        else:
            intro += 'æˆ‘çš„å¹´é¾„ä¿å¯†~'

        print(intro)

person1 = Person(name= 'Bornforthis', gender= 'ç”·', age= 28, weight= 75)
person1.introduce()

#-------output-------
å¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œ æˆ‘å« Bornforthisã€‚æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”·å­©ã€‚æˆ‘ä»Šå¹´28å²äº†ã€‚

ä¿®æ”¹ï¼š

é€šè¿‡ç›´æ¥å˜é‡èµ‹å€¼å°±å¯ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œå¦‚ person1.weight = 80 ã€‚

return intro   # ä¸Šé¢å‡½æ•°ä¸ç”¨ print æ”¹æˆ return

person1 = Person(name= 'Bornforthis', gender= 'ç”·', age= 28, weight= 75)
person1.introduce()

print(person1.name, person1.gender, person1.age, person1.weight)

print('ä¿®æ”¹å‰ï¼š{}'.format(person1.introduce()))
person1.name = 'AIåˆ›æ‚¦'
person1.weight = 80
print('ä¿®æ”¹åï¼š{}'.format(person1.introduce()))

#-------output-------
Bornforthis ç”· 28 75
ä¿®æ”¹å‰ï¼šå¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œ æˆ‘å« Bornforthisã€‚æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”·å­©ã€‚æˆ‘ä»Šå¹´28å²äº†ã€‚ æˆ‘çš„ä½“é‡æ˜¯ 75 åƒå…‹ã€‚
ä¿®æ”¹åï¼šå¤§å®¶å¥½ï¼Œ æˆ‘å« AIåˆ›æ‚¦ã€‚æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”·å­©ã€‚æˆ‘ä»Šå¹´28å²äº†ã€‚ æˆ‘çš„ä½“é‡æ˜¯ 80 åƒå…‹ã€‚

6. ç±»çš„ç§æœ‰å±æ€§

why ç§æœ‰ï¼Ÿä¾‹å¦‚æ‰‹æœºå¯†ç ï¼Œé¢éƒ¨è¯†åˆ«ç­‰ï¼Œåªæœ‰è‡ªå·±æ‰èƒ½è®¿é—®è¿™äº›ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚åŒæ ·ï¼Œpython çš„ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä¿æŠ¤ä¸€äº›å†…éƒ¨æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¸å¸Œæœ›ä»å¤–éƒ¨å°±èƒ½è½»æ˜“è®¿é—®å’Œä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å°±ä¼šç”¨åˆ°ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ã€‚

6.1 ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Ÿ

åœ¨ Python ä¸­ï¼Œä»¥åŒä¸‹åˆ’çº¿ï¼ˆ__ ï¼‰å¼€å¤´çš„å±æ€§ä¸ºç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Œä¿æŠ¤ç±»å†…éƒ¨çš„é‡è¦æ•°æ®ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸æ˜¯å¸Œæœ›åˆ«äººå®Œå…¨è®¿é—®ä¸åˆ°è¿™äº›æ•°æ®ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯å¸Œæœ›åˆ«äººé€šè¿‡ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•æ¥é—´æ¥çš„è®¿é—®æˆ–ä¿®æ”¹è¿™äº›æ•°æ®ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±èƒ½åœ¨æ–¹æ³•ä¸­è¿›è¡Œé¢å¤–çš„é€»è¾‘æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æ£€æŸ¥è¾“å…¥æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¡®ã€è®¿é—®è®°å½•æ—¥å¿—ç­‰ã€‚

6.2 ç°å®ä¸¾ä¾‹ï¼šæ‰‹æœºå¯†ç ä¸è§£é”

ä»£ç æç¤ºï¼š

# åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ‰‹æœºå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè®¾ç½®å¯†ç ä¸ºï¼š'123456'ï¼Œç§å¯†æ•°æ®ä¸ºï¼šæˆ‘çš„ç§˜å¯†ç…§ç‰‡å’ŒèŠå¤©è®°å½•
my_phone = Phone("123456", "æˆ‘çš„ç§˜å¯†ç…§ç‰‡å’ŒèŠå¤©è®°å½•")

# æˆ‘å°è¯•ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®æ•°æ®ï¼Œç»“æœä¼šå¤±è´¥ï¼ˆä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼‰
# print(my_phone.__data)  # é”™è¯¯ï¼æ— æ³•è®¿é—®ï¼ŒæŠ¥é”™ï¼šAttributeError: 'Phone' object has no attribute '__data'

# æ­£ç¡®çš„è®¿é—®æ–¹æ³•ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ç±»æä¾›çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆå‡½æ•°ï¼‰è¿›è¡Œè°ƒç”¨ç§æœ‰å±æ€§çš„å€¼
data = my_phone.unlock("123456")  # è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„å¯†ç 
print("æ‰‹æœºä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯ï¼š", data)

data = my_phone.unlock("wrong_password")  # è¾“å…¥é”™è¯¯çš„å¯†ç 
print("æ‰‹æœºä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯ï¼š", data)

ä¸ªäººä»£ç ï¼š

class Phone():
    def __init__(self, password, data):
        self.__password = password
        self.__data = data

    def unlock(self, password):
        if password == self.__password:
            print(f'æ‰‹æœºä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯ï¼š{self.__data}')
        else:
            print('å¯†ç è¾“å…¥é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ï¼')



my_phone = Phone("123456", "æˆ‘çš„ç§˜å¯†ç…§ç‰‡å’ŒèŠå¤©è®°å½•")

print(my_phone.__data)

my_phone.unlock("123456")

my_phone.unlock("wrong_password")

ä¿®æ”¹ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼š

  • ä»£ç ä¸­æ›´é€‚åˆç”¨ return ï¼Œè€Œé printï¼Œprint åªæ˜¯æŠŠå†…å®¹æ˜¾ç¤ºå‡ºæ¥è€Œå·²ã€‚
class Phone():
    def __init__(self, password, data):
        self.__password = password          # ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®
        self.__data = data                  # ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Œä¿æŠ¤æ•°æ®

    def unlock(self, password):
        # é€šè¿‡ unlock çš„æ–¹æ³•è®¿é—®ç§æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œé€»è¾‘æ§åˆ¶
        if password == self.__password:
            print('å¯†ç æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œæ‰‹æœºå·²è§£é”ï¼')
            return self.__data                   # return è¿”å›ç§å¯†æ•°æ®
        else:
            print('å¯†ç è¾“å…¥é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ï¼')
            return None



# åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„æ‰‹æœºå¯¹è±¡
my_phone = Phone("123456", "æˆ‘çš„ç§˜å¯†ç…§ç‰‡å’ŒèŠå¤©è®°å½•")

# å°è¯•ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¼šæŠ¥é”™
# print(my_phone.__data)

# æ­£ç¡®è®¿é—®æ–¹æ³•
data = my_phone.unlock("123456")
print('æ‰‹æœºä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯ï¼š', data)

data = my_phone.unlock("wrong_password")
print('æ‰‹æœºä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯ï¼š', data)

#-------output-------
å¯†ç æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œæ‰‹æœºå·²è§£é”ï¼
æ‰‹æœºä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯ï¼š æˆ‘çš„ç§˜å¯†ç…§ç‰‡å’ŒèŠå¤©è®°å½•
å¯†ç è¾“å…¥é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ï¼
æ‰‹æœºä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯ï¼š None

å°è´´å£«ï¼š

  1. æ‰‹æœºå¯†ç ç›¸å½“äºç±»çš„ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Œå¤–äººä¸èƒ½è½»æ˜“æŸ¥çœ‹ï¼Œç›¸å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°æ®ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ã€‚
  2. æ‰‹æœºè§£é”çš„åŠ¨ä½œï¼Œç›¸å½“äºç±»è§„å®šçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé€šè¿‡è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®æœªè¢«å…¬å¼€çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ä¹Ÿå†³å®šäº†å“ªäº›å¯ä»¥å…¬å¼€ï¼Œå“ªäº›å—åˆ°ä¿æŠ¤ã€‚

6.3 ä¸ºä½•ä½¿ç”¨ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Ÿ

å®‰å…¨æ€§ï¼šé˜²æ­¢å¤–äººéšæ„æ‰“å¼€

éšç§æ€§ï¼šé˜²æ­¢å¤–äººéšæ„æŸ¥çœ‹å†…å®¹

ä¿æŠ¤æ€§ï¼šé˜²æ­¢é‡Œé¢çš„å†…å®¹æŸæ¯

æ§åˆ¶æ€§ï¼šæœ‰é’¥åŒ™æˆ–å¯†ç ï¼Œèƒ½å†³å®šä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™æ‰“å¼€ï¼Œä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™å…³ä¸Š

6.4 å¦‚ä½•è®¿é—®ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Ÿ

Python çš„ç§æœ‰å±æ€§å¹¶éç»å¯¹ç§æœ‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ç‰¹æ®Šæ–¹æ³•è®¿é—®ï¼ˆä¸å»ºè®®ï¼‰

# é€šè¿‡ç‰¹æ®Šè¯­æ³•è®¿é—®
print(my_phone._Phone__data)    # è¾“å‡ºä¸ºï¼šæˆ‘çš„ç§˜å¯†ç…§ç‰‡å’ŒèŠå¤©è®°å½•

è¿˜å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è¿™ç§æ–¹æ³•æ¥ä¿®æ”¹å±æ€§å€¼ï¼š

# ä¿®æ”¹ç§æœ‰æ•°æ®
my_phone._Phone__data = 'æ–°çš„æ•°æ®'
print(my_phone._Phone__data)

#-------output-------
æ–°çš„æ•°æ®

åœ¨å®é™…å¼€å‘ä¸­ï¼Œä¸å»ºè®®è¿™ä¹ˆåšï¼Œè¿™ç§ç‰¹æ®Šè®¿é—®æ–¹å¼ä»…åœ¨è°ƒè¯•æˆ–è€…ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µä¸‹ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

7. å°è¯•ç‰›åˆ€

Answer
class MagicBag():
    def __init__(self, name, items = [], bag_capacity = 5):
        self.name = name
        self.__items = items
        self.__bag_capacity = bag_capacity

    def add_item(self, item):
        if self.__bag_capacity >= 1:                    # éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„ä¸€ä¸‹å®¹é‡çš„èŒƒå›´
            self.__items.append(item)
            self.__bag_capacity -= 1
            return self.__items, self.__bag_capacity
        else:
            print('èƒŒåŒ…å·²æ»¡ï¼Œæ— æ³•æ·»åŠ ï¼')

    def remove_item(self, item):
        if item in self.__items:
            self.__items.remove(item)
            self.__bag_capacity += 1
            print(f'{self.name}çš„èƒŒåŒ…ä¸­çš„{item}å·²ç§»é™¤')
            return self.__items, self.__bag_capacity
        else:
            print('æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°è¯¥ç‰©å“ã€‚')

    def show_items(self):
        print(f'å½“å‰èƒŒåŒ…ä¸­æœ‰ï¼š{self.__items}')

# ====== æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç  ======
if __name__ == "__main__":
    # åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªé­”æ³•èƒŒåŒ…å¯¹è±¡
    bag = MagicBag("å‹‡è€…é˜¿å…‰")

    # æ·»åŠ  5 ä¸ªç‰©å“
    bag.add_item("æœ¨å‰‘")
    bag.add_item("çš®ç”²")
    bag.add_item("å›å¤è¯æ°´")
    bag.add_item("ç«æŠŠ")
    bag.add_item("å¹²ç²®")

    # å†æ·»åŠ ç¬¬ 6 ä¸ªç‰©å“ï¼Œåº”è¯¥æç¤ºèƒŒåŒ…å·²æ»¡
    bag.add_item("é“å‰‘")

    # å±•ç¤ºå½“å‰èƒŒåŒ…å†…å®¹
    bag.show_items()

    # ç§»é™¤ä¸€ä¸ªç‰©å“
    bag.remove_item("ç«æŠŠ")

    # å†æ¬¡å±•ç¤ºèƒŒåŒ…å†…å®¹
    bag.show_items()

    # å°è¯•ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®èƒŒåŒ…çš„ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼ˆä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼‰
    try:
        print(bag.__items)  # AttributeError
    except AttributeError as e:
        print("ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®ç§æœ‰å±æ€§å¤±è´¥ï¼š", e)

    # ï¼ˆè¡¥å……æ¼”ç¤ºï¼Œä¸æ¨èè¿™ä¹ˆåšï¼‰é€šè¿‡åç§°æ”¹å†™å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®ç§æœ‰å±æ€§
    # print("å·å·è®¿é—®ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼š", bag._MagicBag__items)
initä¿®æ”¹
class MagicBag():
    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name
        self.__items = []
        self.__bag_capacity = 5
add_itemä¿®æ”¹
	def add_item(self, item):
        if len(self.__items) >= self.__capacity:
            print('èƒŒåŒ…å·²æ»¡ï¼Œæ— æ³•æ·»åŠ ï¼š', item)
            return                # return æœ‰ç»“æŸä»£ç çš„ä½œç”¨ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¦‚æœèƒŒåŒ…æ»¡äº†ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ä¼šç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œåé¢çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸éœ€è¦ else
        # å¦åˆ™æ·»åŠ ç‰©å“åˆ°åˆ—è¡¨ 
        self.__items.append(item)
        print(f'æˆåŠŸæ·»åŠ ç‰©å“ï¼š{item}')
remove_itemä¿®æ”¹
	    def remove_item(self, item):
        if item not in self.__items:
            print('æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°è¯¥ç‰©å“', item)
            return
        # ç§»é™¤æŒ‡å®šç‰©å“
        self.__items.remove(item)
        print(f'æˆåŠŸç§»é™¤ç‰©å“ï¼š{item}')
show_itemsä¿®æ”¹
    def show_items(self):
        if not self.__items:
            print('èƒŒåŒ…æ˜¯ç©ºçš„')
        else:
            print(f'{self.name}çš„èƒŒåŒ…ä¸­æœ‰ï¼š{self.__items}')

8. ç±»å†…éƒ¨çš„å˜é‡å¦‚ä½•å…±ç”¨

åœ¨ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œéœ€è¦å®šä¹‰ä¸€äº›å›ºå®šä¸å˜çš„å˜é‡ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚å¸¸é‡ã€‚è¿™äº›å¸¸é‡æ¯ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡éƒ½ä¼šç”¨åˆ°ï¼Œæ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦æ¯æ¬¡åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡æ—¶éƒ½æ„å»ºä¸€æ¬¡å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

ä¸éœ€è¦ï¼

åªè¦åœ¨ç±»çš„å†…éƒ¨åˆé€‚çš„ä½ç½®å®šä¹‰å¥½ï¼Œå°±èƒ½å®ç°ç±»å†…å˜é‡å…±ç”¨ã€‚

8.1 ç±»ä¸­çš„å¸¸é‡ï¼ˆç±»å˜é‡ï¼‰

ç±»ä¼¼ç¤¾å›¢æœ‰ç»Ÿä¸€çš„å£å·ï¼Œpython ä¸­ä¹Ÿæœ‰ç»Ÿä¸€çš„å£å·ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æˆä¸ºç±»å˜é‡ã€‚åªéœ€è¦å®šä¹‰ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰å¯¹è±¡å¯ä»¥å…±äº«ã€‚

class Entity:
    WELCOME_STR = 'æ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ° Python å­¦ä¹ ç¤¾å›¢ï¼'     # ç±»å˜é‡ï¼ˆå¸¸é‡ï¼‰

    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name

    def say_welcome(self):
        print(f'{self.name}è¯´ï¼š{self.WELCOME_STR}')


entity_a = Entity('Alice')
entity_b = Entity('Bob')

entity_a.say_welcome()
entity_b.say_welcome()

# ç±»å˜é‡ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ç”¨ç±»åè®¿é—®
print(Entity.WELCOME_STR)

#-------output-------
Aliceè¯´ï¼šæ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ° Python å­¦ä¹ ç¤¾å›¢ï¼
Bobè¯´ï¼šæ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ° Python å­¦ä¹ ç¤¾å›¢ï¼
æ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ° Python å­¦ä¹ ç¤¾å›¢ï¼

8.2 å‡½æ•°ä¹‹é—´çš„å±€éƒ¨å˜é‡æ— æ³•å…±ç”¨

ç°å®ç”Ÿæ´»ä¸­ï¼Œäººä»¬çš„ç§æœ‰ç‰©å“ä¸èƒ½å…±ç”¨ï¼Œå‡½æ•°ä¹Ÿä¸€æ ·ï¼Œåªèƒ½åœ¨å‡½æ•°å†…éƒ¨ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæ— æ³•è¢«å…¶ä»–å‡½æ•°ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®ã€‚

def function_a():
    a = 10 
    print(f'function_a çš„å˜é‡ a æ˜¯ï¼š', a)
    
def function_b():
    print(a)   # è¿™é‡Œä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ— æ³•è®¿é—®function_a çš„å±€éƒ¨å˜é‡ a

åŠ ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªå…¨å±€å˜é‡å°±èƒ½å…±ç”¨ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š

BOOK_NAME = 'è·ŸAIæ‚¦åˆ›å­¦ä¹ æœ€å‰æ²¿çš„ç¼–ç¨‹æ€ç»´å’Œäººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½'      # å…¨å±€å˜é‡ï¼Œä»»ä½•å‡½æ•°éƒ½èƒ½é€ è®¿

def function_a():
    print(f'function_a æ­£åœ¨è¯»ä¹¦ï¼š', BOOK_NAME)

def function_b():
    print('function_b æ­£åœ¨è¯»ä¹¦ï¼š', BOOK_NAME)   

function_a()
function_b()

8.3 ç±»å†…éƒ¨å˜é‡å„ä¸ªå‡½æ•°éšæ„è°ƒç”¨

ç¤ºä¾‹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

class Family:
    def __init__(self):
        self.bridge = ['è‰è“', 'å·§å…‹åŠ›', 'ç‰›å¥¶', 'æ°´æœ', 'è›‹ç³•']

    def dad_take_food(self):
        food = self.bridge.pop()
        print('çˆ¸çˆ¸æ‹¿èµ°äº†ï¼š', food)

    def mam_take_food(self):
        food = self.bridge.pop()
        print('å¦ˆå¦ˆæ‹¿èµ°äº†ï¼š', food)

    def child_take_food(self):
        food = self.bridge.pop()
        print('å­©å­æ‹¿èµ°äº†ï¼š', food)
        

family = Family()
family.dad_take_food()
family.mam_take_food()
family.child_take_food()
print(family.bridge)
['è‰è“', 'å·§å…‹åŠ›']

#-------output-------
çˆ¸çˆ¸æ‹¿èµ°äº†ï¼š è›‹ç³•
å¦ˆå¦ˆæ‹¿èµ°äº†ï¼š æ°´æœ
å­©å­æ‹¿èµ°äº†ï¼š ç‰›å¥¶

ä½¿ç”¨å…¨å±€å˜é‡çš„å½±å“

ä¸ä½¿ç”¨ self è€Œä½¿ç”¨å…¨å±€å˜é‡çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼šå…¨å±€å˜é‡ä¼šè¢«æ›´æ”¹ã€‚

count = 0

def increment():
    global count
    count += 1
    
def get_count():
    return count

increment()
print(get_count())    # è¾“å‡ºä¸º1ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯0

å°ç»“ä¸å›é¡¾

å˜é‡ç±»å‹å®šä¹‰ä½ç½®ä½œç”¨åŸŸä¸¾ä¸ªç”Ÿæ´»ä¸­çš„ä¾‹å­
å±€éƒ¨å˜é‡å‡½æ•°å†…éƒ¨æœ¬å‡½æ•°å†…æœ‰æ•ˆè‡ªå·±çš„ç§äººç”¨å“ï¼Œåˆ«äººä¸èƒ½éšæ„æ‹¿
å…¨å±€å˜é‡å‡½æ•°å¤–éƒ¨æ‰€æœ‰å‡½æ•°éƒ½æœ‰æ•ˆå…¬å…±çš„ç‰©å“ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚å›¾ä¹¦é¦†çš„ä¹¦
ç±»å˜é‡ç±»çš„å†…éƒ¨ï¼Œæ–¹æ³•ä¹‹å¤–ç±»å†…æ‰€æœ‰å¯¹è±¡éƒ½æœ‰æ•ˆç¤¾å›¢å…±æœ‰çš„å£å·
å®ä¾‹å˜é‡ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•å†…ï¼Œé€šè¿‡selfå®šä¹‰å•ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å†…æ‰€æœ‰æ–¹æ³•æœ‰æ•ˆå®¶åº­å†…éƒ¨å…±äº«çš„å†°ç®±

8.4 ç±»å†…éƒ¨çš„å‡½æ•°äº’ç›¸è°ƒç”¨

ç±»å†…éƒ¨çš„å˜é‡å¯ä»¥å…±äº«ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆç±»å†…éƒ¨çš„å‡½æ•°ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å…±äº«ã€‚

æ¯”å¦‚å®¶é‡Œå‡†å¤‡æ™šé¥­ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ï¼š

  • å¦ˆå¦ˆå‡†å¤‡é£Ÿæ
  • çˆ¸çˆ¸çƒ¹é¥ª
  • å­©å­æ‘†æ”¾é¤æ¡Œ

æ­¤æ—¶ï¼Œçˆ¸çˆ¸çš„ä»»åŠ¡ä¸­éœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨åˆ°å¦ˆå¦ˆä»»åŠ¡ä¸­å‡†å¤‡çš„é£Ÿæã€‚

8.4.1 ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šå®šä¹‰å¤šä¸ªæ–¹æ³•

class FamilyDinner:
    def prepare_ingredients(self):
        print('å¦ˆå¦ˆæ­£åœ¨å‡†å¤‡é£Ÿæï¼šæ´—èœã€åˆ‡èœã€å‡†å¤‡è°ƒæ–™ã€‚')
    
    def cook_food(self):
        print('çˆ¸çˆ¸å¼€å§‹çƒ¹é¥ªäº†ï¼')
        self.prepare_ingredients()     # è°ƒç”¨å‡†å¤‡é£Ÿæçš„æ–¹æ³•
        print('çˆ¸çˆ¸æ­£åœ¨çƒ¹é¥ªèœè‚´ï¼šç‚’èœã€ç…®æ±¤ã€‚')
        
    def set_table(self):
        print('å­©å­æ­£åœ¨æ‘†æ”¾é¤æ¡Œã€‚')

8.4.2 ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šæ–¹æ³•ä¹‹é—´å¦‚ä½•è°ƒç”¨

dinner = FamilyDinner()

dinner.cook_food()
dinner.set_table()

#-------output-------
çˆ¸çˆ¸å¼€å§‹çƒ¹é¥ªäº†ï¼
å¦ˆå¦ˆæ­£åœ¨å‡†å¤‡é£Ÿæï¼šæ´—èœã€åˆ‡èœã€å‡†å¤‡è°ƒæ–™ã€‚
çˆ¸çˆ¸æ­£åœ¨çƒ¹é¥ªèœè‚´ï¼šç‚’èœã€ç…®æ±¤ã€‚
å­©å­æ­£åœ¨æ‘†æ”¾é¤æ¡Œã€‚

è°ƒç”¨æ—¶ï¼Œåœ¨éœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„å†…éƒ¨å‡½æ•°å‰æ·»åŠ  self. å³å¯å®ç°ç±»å†…éƒ¨çš„å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå› æ­¤åªéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ç±»ä¸­çš„2ä¸ªå‡½æ•°å°±å¯å®ç°3ä¸ªå‡½æ•°çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

8.4.2 ç»§æ‰¿ï¼Œæ˜¯æ¯ä¸ªå¯ŒäºŒä»£çš„æ¢¦æƒ³ã€Œé€‰å­¦ã€

æç¤ºï¼šæ¥ä¸‹æ¥çš„ç»§æ‰¿å†…å®¹ï¼Œä¸€æ—¶é—´çœ‹ä¸æ‡‚å­¦ä¸ä¼šæ²¡æœ‰äº‹çš„ï¼Œå®Œå…¨ä¸å½±å“ä½ å…¥é—¨ Pythonã€‚

æ—¢ç„¶ç±»æ˜¯ä¸€ç¾¤ç›¸ä¼¼çš„å¯¹è±¡çš„é›†åˆï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä¸å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ç¾¤ç›¸ä¼¼çš„ç±»çš„é›†åˆå‘¢ï¼Ÿ

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥çœ‹ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ—¢ç„¶ç±»æ˜¯ä¸€ç¾¤ç›¸ä¼¼çš„å¯¹è±¡çš„é›†åˆï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä¸å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ç¾¤ç›¸ä¼¼çš„ç±»çš„é›†åˆå‘¢ï¼Ÿ

ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯ï¼Œå½“ç„¶å¯ä»¥ã€‚åªè¦æŠ½è±¡å¾—å¥½ï¼Œç±»å¯ä»¥æè¿°æˆä»»ä½•äº‹ç‰©çš„é›†åˆã€‚å½“ç„¶ä½ è¦å°å¿ƒã€ä¸¥è°¨åœ°å»å®šä¹‰å®ƒï¼Œä¸ç„¶ä¸€ä¸å°å¿ƒå°±ä¼šå¼•èµ·ç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡æ•°å­¦å±æœº XDï¼ˆç»´åŸºç™¾ç§‘ï¼šhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell%27s_paradoxã€‚

ç±»çš„ç»§æ‰¿ï¼Œé¡¾åæ€ä¹‰ï¼ŒæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç±»æ—¢æ‹¥æœ‰å¦ä¸€ä¸ªç±»çš„ç‰¹å¾ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ‹¥æœ‰ä¸åŒäºå¦ä¸€ä¸ªç±»çš„ç‹¬ç‰¹ç‰¹å¾ã€‚åœ¨è¿™é‡Œçš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç±»å«åšå­ç±»ï¼Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªå«åšçˆ¶ç±»ï¼Œç‰¹å¾å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯ç±»çš„å±æ€§å’Œå‡½æ•°ã€‚

class Entity():
    def __init__(self, object_type):
        print('parent class init called')
        self.object_type = object_type
    
    def get_context_length(self):
        raise Exception('get_context_length not implemented')     # èµ·åˆ°ä¸»åŠ¨æŠ¥é”™çš„ä½œç”¨
    
    def print_title(self):
        print(self.title)

class Document(Entity):
    def __init__(self, title, author, context):
        print('Document class init called')
        Entity.__init__(self, 'document')
        self.title = title
        self.author = author
        self.__context = context
    
    def get_context_length(self):
        return len(self.__context)
    
class Video(Entity):
    def __init__(self, title, author, video_length):
        print('Video class init called')
        Entity.__init__(self, 'video')
        self.title = title
        self.author = author
        self.__video_length = video_length
    
    def get_context_length(self):
        return self.__video_length

harry_potter_book = Document('Harry Potter(Book)', 'J. K. Rowling', '... Forever Do not believe any thing is capable of thinking independently ...')
harry_potter_movie = Video('Harry Potter(Movie)', 'J. K. Rowling', 120)

print(harry_potter_book.object_type)
print(harry_potter_movie.object_type)

harry_potter_book.print_title()
harry_potter_movie.print_title()

print(harry_potter_book.get_context_length())
print(harry_potter_movie.get_context_length())


# ---output---
Document class init called
parent class init called
Video class init called
parent class init called
document
video
Harry Potter(Book)
Harry Potter(Movie)
77
120

æˆ‘ä»¬åŒæ ·ç»“åˆä»£ç æ¥å­¦ä¹ è¿™äº›æ¦‚å¿µã€‚åœ¨è¿™æ®µä»£ç ä¸­ï¼ŒDocument å’Œ Video å®ƒä»¬æœ‰ç›¸ä¼¼çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œéƒ½æœ‰ç›¸åº”çš„æ ‡é¢˜ã€ä½œè€…å’Œå†…å®¹ç­‰å±æ€§ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä»ä¸­æŠ½è±¡å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå«åš Entity çš„ç±»ï¼Œæ¥ä½œä¸ºå®ƒä¿©çš„çˆ¶ç±»ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªç±»éƒ½æœ‰æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç»§æ‰¿ç±»åœ¨ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹è±¡çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä½ å¿…é¡»åœ¨ init() å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ˜¾å¼è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ã€‚å®ƒä»¬çš„æ‰§è¡Œé¡ºåºæ˜¯ å­ç±»çš„æ„é€ å‡½æ•° -> çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ã€‚

å…¶æ¬¡éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çˆ¶ç±» get_context_length() å‡½æ•°ã€‚å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨ Entity ç›´æ¥ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨ get_context_length() å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå°±ä¼š raise error ä¸­æ–­ç¨‹åºçš„æ‰§è¡Œã€‚è¿™å…¶å®æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¾ˆå¥½çš„å†™æ³•ï¼Œå«åšå‡½æ•°é‡å†™ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿å­ç±»å¿…é¡»é‡æ–°å†™ä¸€é get_context_length() å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ¥è¦†ç›–æ‰åŸæœ‰å‡½æ•°ã€‚

æœ€åéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„åˆ° print_title() å‡½æ•°ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°å®šä¹‰åœ¨çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å­ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡å¯ä»¥æ¯«æ— é˜»åŠ›åœ°ä½¿ç”¨å®ƒæ¥æ‰“å° titleï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿå°±ä½“ç°äº†ç»§æ‰¿çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼šå‡å°‘é‡å¤çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œé™ä½ç³»ç»Ÿçš„ç†µå€¼ï¼ˆå³å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼‰ã€‚

åˆ°è¿™é‡Œï¼Œä½ å¯¹ç»§æ‰¿å°±æœ‰äº†æ¯”è¾ƒè¯¦ç»†çš„äº†è§£äº†ï¼Œé¢å‘å¯¹è±¡ç¼–ç¨‹ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è¯´å·²ç»å…¥é—¨äº†ã€‚å½“ç„¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½ æƒ³è¾¾åˆ°æ›´é«˜çš„å±‚æ¬¡ï¼Œå¤§é‡ç»ƒä¹ ç¼–ç¨‹ï¼Œå­¦ä¹ æ›´å¤šçš„ç»†èŠ‚çŸ¥è¯†ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯å¿…ä¸å¯å°‘çš„ã€‚

9. ç»ƒä¹ 

9.1 ä¸ªäººå›ç­”

import random

class Game():
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç©å®¶å§“åã€HPã€æ•ŒäººHP
    def __init__(self, player_name):
        self.player_name = player_name
        self.player_hp = 100
        self.enemy_hp = 80


    # ç©å®¶æ“ä½œæ”»å‡»/é˜²å®ˆ
    def actions(self):
        self.action = input('Attack or Defense (A/D):')
        if self.action == 'A':
            self.enemy_hp -= random.randint(1, 20)
            if self.enemy_hp <=0:
                return
            self.player_hp -= random.randint(1, 20)
        elif self.action == 'D':
            self.player_hp -= random.randint(1, 20)/10
        else:
            print('Invalid action')

#  main
player_name = input('è¯·è¾“å…¥ç©å®¶å§“åï¼š')
player1 = Game(player_name)             # åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹å¹¶å®Œæˆåˆå§‹åŒ–


while player1.player_hp > 0 and player1.enemy_hp >0:
    # æ˜¾ç¤ºç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººè¡€é‡
    print(f'{player1.player_name} HP: {player1.player_hp:.2f}')
    print(f'Enemy HP: {player1.enemy_hp:.2f}')

    # è°ƒç”¨æ“ä½œå‡½æ•°ï¼Œç©å®¶é€‰æ‹©æ”»å‡»/é˜²å®ˆ
    player1.actions()

if player1.player_hp > 0:
    print('You win!')
else:
    print('You lose!')


# ---output---
è¯·è¾“å…¥ç©å®¶å§“åï¼šRan
Ran HP: 100.00
Enemy HP: 80.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):A
Ran HP: 91.00
Enemy HP: 61.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):A
Ran HP: 79.00
Enemy HP: 48.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):A
Ran HP: 70.00
Enemy HP: 30.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):D
Ran HP: 68.80
Enemy HP: 30.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):D
Ran HP: 68.10
Enemy HP: 30.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):D
Ran HP: 67.60
Enemy HP: 30.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):A
Ran HP: 47.60
Enemy HP: 27.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):A
Ran HP: 40.60
Enemy HP: 26.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):A
Ran HP: 25.60
Enemy HP: 23.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):A
Ran HP: 7.60
Enemy HP: 8.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):D
Ran HP: 7.00
Enemy HP: 8.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):D
Ran HP: 6.60
Enemy HP: 8.00
Attack or Defense (A/D):A
You win!

9.2 è€å¸ˆæ€è·¯

ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼š

  • ç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººéƒ½å¯ä»¥å½“åšæ˜¯å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå› æ­¤åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶å¯ä»¥æŠŠæ•Œäººä¹Ÿå½“åšæ˜¯ç±»ä¼¼å¯¹è±¡çš„å®ä¾‹ã€‚
import random

class Creature():
    def attack(self):
        attack_value = random.randint(1, 50)
        return attack_value
    
player = Creature()
enemy = Creature()

æ­¤å¤„éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘ç±»ç©¶ç«Ÿå¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººéƒ½æ˜¯ç±»ä¼¼çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ç±»å°†å…¶å®ä¾‹åŒ–å‡ºæ¥ã€‚

  • æ¸¸æˆç»§ç»­çš„æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººéƒ½è¿˜æ´»ç€ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥å»ºç«‹ä¸€ä¸ª while å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ¡ä»¶å°±æ˜¯ player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead() ï¼Œæ­¤å¤„åˆå­˜åœ¨å…±æ€§ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥åœ¨ç±»ä¸­å»ºç«‹ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°çœ‹ç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººæ˜¯å¦éƒ½å­˜æ´»ã€‚
import random

class Creature():
    def attack(self):
        attack_value = random.randint(1, 50)
        return attack_value
    
    def not_dead(self):
        pass

player = Creature()
enemy = Creature()

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    pass
  • å½“éœ€è¦ç¼–å†™ not-dead å‡½æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å‘ç°åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ­»äº¡çš„æ ‡å‡†æ˜¯è¡€é‡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç›®å‰è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰è¡€é‡è¿™ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨å®ä¾‹åŒ–çš„æ—¶å€™å°†è¡€é‡å½“åšå‚æ•°ä¼ è¿›å»ï¼Œå°±éœ€è¦äº† init å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å†ç¼–å†™ init å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶åŠ å…¥éœ€è¦çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚
import random

class Creature():
    def __init__(self, hp):                    # æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦è®¾ç½®å‚æ•°ï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–
        self.hp = hp
        
        
    def attack(self):
        attack_value = random.randint(1, 50)
        return attack_value

    def not_dead(self):
        pass

player = Creature(100)                          # ä¼ å…¥å‚æ•°
enemy = Creature(80)

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    pass
  • æœ‰äº† hp å°±å¯ä»¥ç¼–å†™ not_dead è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°äº†ï¼Œå³è¡€é‡ï¼0 ä¸º Trueã€‚
    def not_dead(self):
        if self.hp > 0:
            return True
        else:
            return False

ç»§ç»­ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼š

ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†å½“ç¬¦åˆæŸç§æ¡ä»¶æ—¶ï¼Œè¿”å›æˆ‘ä»¬æŒ‡å®šçš„ç»“æœï¼Œä»æ¯”è¾ƒè¿ç®—ç¬¦å¤„å¯çŸ¥ï¼Œè¿è¡Œçš„ç»“æœæ˜¯å¸ƒå°”ç±»å‹ ï¼Œæ°å¥½å’Œæˆ‘ä»¬æœ¬èº«å¸Œæœ›è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœæ˜¯ä¸€è‡´çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥ä¼˜åŒ–æˆç›´æ¥è¿”å›æ¯”è¾ƒçš„ç»“æœï¼Œå³ return self.hp > 0 ã€‚

    def not_dead(self):
        if self.hp <= 0:
            return False
        else:
            return True
        
        # ç­‰ä»· 1
        # if self.hp <= 0:
        #     return False
        # return True

        # ç­‰ä»· 2
        # æœ¬èº«ä¸Šè¿°çš„å†™æ³•ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†å½“ç¬¦åˆæŸç§æ¡ä»¶æ—¶ï¼Œè¿”å›æˆ‘ä»¬æŒ‡å®šçš„ç»“æœ
        # è€Œæˆ‘ä»¬ç°åœ¨éœ€è¦è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœï¼Œæ°å¥½å’Œæˆ‘ä»¬æœ¬èº«æŒ‡å®šçš„ç»“æœæ˜¯ä¸€è‡´çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥ä¼˜åŒ–æˆå¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼š
        # return self.hp > 0
  • ç–‘é—®ç‚¹ï¼šæ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦å†™ defenceï¼Ÿæ„Ÿè§‰é€»è¾‘å¤æ‚ä¸é€šã€‚

è‡ªå·±ç»§ç»­ä¸Šè¿°æ€è·¯è¡¥å……çš„åç»­ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

import random

class Game():
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç©å®¶å§“åã€HPã€æ•ŒäººHP
    def __init__(self, player_name):
        self.player_name = player_name
        self.player_hp = 100
        self.enemy_hp = 80


    # ç©å®¶æ“ä½œæ”»å‡»/é˜²å®ˆ
    def actions(self):
        self.action = input('Attack or Defense (A/D):')
        if self.action == 'A':
            self.enemy_hp -= random.randint(1, 20)
            if self.enemy_hp <=0:
                return
            self.player_hp -= random.randint(1, 20)
        elif self.action == 'D':
            self.player_hp -= random.randint(1, 20)/10
        else:
            print('Invalid action')

#  main
player_name = input('è¯·è¾“å…¥ç©å®¶å§“åï¼š')
player1 = Game(player_name)             # åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹å¹¶å®Œæˆåˆå§‹åŒ–


while player1.player_hp > 0 and player1.enemy_hp >0:
    # æ˜¾ç¤ºç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººè¡€é‡
    print(f'{player1.player_name} HP: {player1.player_hp:.2f}')
    print(f'Enemy HP: {player1.enemy_hp:.2f}')

    # è°ƒç”¨æ“ä½œå‡½æ•°ï¼Œç©å®¶é€‰æ‹©æ”»å‡»/é˜²å®ˆ
    player1.actions()

if player1.player_hp > 0:
    print('You win!')
else:
    print('You lose!')

ä»¥ä¸Šä»£ç æš‚æ—¶ä¿ç•™ï¼Œç»§ç»­è€å¸ˆæ€è·¯ï¼š

  • æœ‰hp å€¼ï¼Œä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥å¯ä»¥ç»§ç»­å®ç°äº¤äº’
 if user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()

ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç æœ‰äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æƒ³åˆ°ï¼Œæ— è®ºæ•Œäººæˆ–ç©å®¶ï¼Œéƒ½æœ‰æ”¶åˆ°æ”»å‡»çš„æƒ…èŠ‚ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥ç»§ç»­å†™ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½ èƒ½å¤Ÿå®ç°player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value) ã€‚

   def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        self.hp -= attack_value

å› æ­¤ï¼Œä¸»ç¨‹åºå¤„è¿›è¡Œæ”»å‡»å’Œé˜²å®ˆå°±å¯å†™æˆï¼š

    if user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()

        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value)
        player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

    elif user_input == 'D':
        enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
        player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value * 0.1)      # å› ä¸ºä¸åŒè½¯ä»¶å¯¹é™¤æ³•çš„å¤„ç†ç•¥æœ‰ä¸åŒï¼Œæ›´å€¾å‘ä½¿ç”¨ä¹˜æ³•è€Œä¸æ˜¯é™¤æ³•
  • è¿è¡Œä»£ç åï¼Œå‘ç°æ²¡æœ‰è¡€é‡ã€ä¸çŸ¥é“æ¸¸æˆè¿›ç¨‹ã€ä¸çŸ¥é“æ¸¸æˆä½•æ—¶ç»“æŸã€‚é¦–å…ˆè¡¥å……è¡€é‡æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼š

æ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡åœ¨ä»€ä¹ˆä½ç½®å‘¢ï¼ŸA or B or C or D

player = Creature(100)
enemy = Creature(80)
# A
while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    # B
    user_input = input("Attack or Defence (A/D): ")  # æ“ä½œ
    # C
    if user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()

        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value)
        player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)
    elif user_input == 'D':
        enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
        player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value * 0.1)
    # D

é€‰æ‹©æ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡çš„ä»£ç ä½ç½®æ—¶ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­åœ¨å¾ªç¯å†…å¤–ï¼Œç”±äºè¡€é‡éœ€è¦å®æ—¶æ›´æ–°ï¼Œå› æ­¤éœ€è¦åœ¨å¾ªç¯å†…ã€‚

å…¶æ¬¡ï¼Œåœ¨æ“ä½œå‰è¦æ ¹æ®è¡€é‡åˆ¤æ–­æ‰§è¡Œä»€ä¹ˆæ“ä½œï¼Œå› æ­¤æ”¾åœ¨ user_input ä¹‹å‰ã€‚

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    # æ­¤å¤„æ·»åŠ è¡€é‡æ˜¾ç¤º
    print()
    user_input = input('Attack or Defence (A/D): ')          # æ“ä½œ
    if user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()

        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value)
        player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

    elif user_input == 'D':
        enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
        player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value * 0.1)      # å› ä¸ºä¸åŒè½¯ä»¶å¯¹é™¤æ³•çš„å¤„ç†ç•¥æœ‰ä¸åŒï¼Œæ›´å€¾å‘ä½¿ç”¨ä¹˜æ³•è€Œä¸æ˜¯é™¤æ³•
  • å¯ä»¥æŠŠæ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡å†™æˆä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°
    def show_status(self):
        print(f'HP: {self.hp}')

ä¸»ç¨‹åºè°ƒç”¨

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()
    user_input = input('Attack or Defence (A/D): ')          # æ“ä½œ
  • æ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡çš„æ—¶å€™å‘ç°ä¸çŸ¥é“å“ªä¸ªæ˜¯å“ªä¸ªçš„è¡€é‡ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•è§£å†³ï¼Ÿ

éœ€è¦åå­—è¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡ï¼Œé‚£å°±åˆå§‹åŒ–çš„æ—¶å€™ä¼ è¿›å»ï¼š

    def __init__(self, name, hp):
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp
        
    def show_status(self):
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP: {self.hp}")
player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)
  • æ·»åŠ åˆ¤æ–­æ¸¸æˆç»“æœçš„ä»£ç ï¼Œæ”¾åœ¨å¾ªç¯ç»“æŸåï¼š
if player.hp > 0:
    print(f"You win! Your HP: {player.hp}")
else:
    print(f"You lose!")

ç–‘é—®ï¼šä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™é€‰æ‹©å†™æˆå‡½æ•°ï¼Ÿ

  1. éœ€è¦é‡å¤ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨å…±æ€§çš„ä¸œè¥¿ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ç©å®¶æœ‰å¤šä¸ªï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦å†™å¤šä¸ª print æ¥æ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡ã€‚
  2. æœ‰å°è£…éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿åæœŸç»Ÿä¸€ä¿®æ”¹ç»´æŠ¤ã€‚
  3. è‹¥å†™åœ¨ä¸»ç¨‹åºé‡Œï¼Œä¿®æ”¹æ—¶å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦æ‹å‰åä»£ç é€»è¾‘ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºå¯èƒ½å˜åŠ¨ï¼Œè‹¥å°è£…æˆå‡½æ•°ï¼Œåªè¦ä¿è¯ return ä¸å˜ï¼Œä¸»å‡½æ•°çš„ä»£ç å‡ºé”™çš„æ¦‚ç‡å°†ä¼šå¤§å¤§å‡å°‘ã€‚

9.3 å¯¹è‡ªå·±çš„ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹

å¯¹è‡ªå·±å†™çš„ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹ï¼š

  • ç©å®¶å§“åå¯ä»¥å½“åšå‚æ•°ä¼ å…¥ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œåœ¨åˆå§‹åŒ–æ­¥éª¤ä¸­å®Œæˆï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯å¯¹æ•Œäººèµ·åã€‚
class Creature():
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–å§“åã€HP
    def __init__(self, name, hp):
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp

å› æ­¤ï¼Œåç»­ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ  Creature(player_name, 100) å’Œ Creature(Enemy, 80) åˆ›å»ºç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººã€‚

player_name = input('è¯·è¾“å…¥ç©å®¶å§“åï¼š')
player = Creature(player_name, 100)             # åˆ›å»ºç©å®¶å¹¶å®Œæˆåˆå§‹åŒ–
enemy = Creature('Monster', 80)          # åˆ›å»ºæ•Œäººå¹¶åˆå§‹åŒ–

ä¸ªäººä»£ç ä¿®æ”¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

import random


# å°†ç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººéƒ½æŠ½è±¡æˆä¸€ä¸ªç±»
class Creature():
    def __init__(self, name, hp):                          # ä¸ç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººéƒ½ç›¸å…³çš„åŸºæœ¬å‚æ•°æ˜¯å§“åå’Œè¡€é‡
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp

    def show_HP(self):                                     # æ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP: {self.hp}")

    def is_alive(self):                                    # ä¸ä¸¤è€…éƒ½ç›¸å…³çš„å­˜äº¡çŠ¶æ€
        return self.hp > 0

    def defence(self, harm):                               # è‡ªå·±é˜²å®ˆæ—¶ï¼Œè¡€é‡åªå‡ååˆ†ä¹‹ä¸€
        self.hp -= 0.1*harm

    def being_attack(self, harm, action):                  # è¢«æ”»å‡»ï¼Œè‡ªå·±è¡€é‡å˜åŒ–
        if action == "D":
            self.defence(harm)
        else:
            self.hp -= harm

    def attack(self, target, action='A'):                   # æ”»å‡»å¯¹æ–¹ï¼Œä¸ºäº†åŒºåˆ†ç©å®¶å’Œæ•Œäººï¼Œéœ€è¦æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ”»å‡»å¯¹è±¡
        harm = random.randint(0, 50)
        target.being_attack(harm, action)                   # å¯¹æ–¹è¢«æ”»å‡»äº†ï¼Œå¯¹æ–¹è¡€é‡å˜åŠ¨ï¼Œåªæœ‰è¢«æ”»å‡»å’Œæ”»å‡»åˆ†å¼€ä¸¤ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½å®ç°å¯¹æ–¹è¡€é‡å˜åŠ¨


# æ¸¸æˆäº¤äº’é˜¶æ®µå¼€å§‹
class Game():
    def __init__(self, player_name):                            # ç©å®¶ç»™å‡ºçš„å§“åä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¼ è¿›å»
        self.player = Creature(player_name, 100)
        self.enemy = Creature('Monster', 80)          # åˆå§‹åŒ–å‡ºæ•Œäºº

    def actions(self):
        while True:
            action = input('Attack or Defence (A/D): ')
            if action in ('A', 'D'):
                return action
            else:
                print("è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ã€‚")

    def play(self):
        while self.player.is_alive() and self.enemy.is_alive():
            self.player.show_HP()
            self.enemy.show_HP()

            # ç©å®¶å¼€å§‹é€‰æ‹©æ”»å‡»/é˜²å®ˆ
            player_action = self.actions()
            if player_action == 'A':
                self.player.attack(self.enemy)         # ç©å®¶æ”»å‡»æ•Œäººå‡è¡€ï¼Œç©å®¶é˜²å®ˆæ—¶ï¼Œæ•Œäººä¸å‡è¡€ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸éœ€è¦æ“ä½œ

            # æ•Œæ–¹å¼€å§‹åå‡»
            if self.enemy.is_alive():                  # çœ‹çœ‹æ•Œæ–¹è¿˜æœ‰è¡€æ²¡ï¼Œæœ‰è¡€å†æ‰“
                self.enemy.attack(self.player, player_action)

        # ç»“ç®—ç»“æœ
        if self.player.is_alive():
            print("\nğŸ‰ ä½ èµ¢äº†ï¼")
        else:
            print("\nğŸ’€ ä½ è¾“äº†ï¼")

# main
player_name = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç©å®¶å§“åï¼š")
game = Game(player_name)
game.play()

ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼š

  • å‡½æ•°å‘½åå°½é‡ä¸è¦ç”¨å¤§å†™ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹å¦‚ä¸‹
def show_hp(self):                                     # æ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP: {self.hp}")
  • å‡½æ•°çš„æ³¨é‡Šå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨å‡½æ•°å†…ç¬¬ä¸€è¡ŒåŠ ä¸‰ä¸ªåŒå¼•å·ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
    def being_attack(self, harm, action):
        """
        è¢«æ”»å‡»æ—¶çš„è¡€é‡å˜åŒ–
        :param harm: ä¼¤å®³å€¼
        :param action: "A" è¡¨ç¤ºæ”»å‡»ï¼›"D" è¡¨ç¤ºé˜²å®ˆ
        """
        if action == "D":
            self.defence(harm)
        else:
            self.hp -= harm

å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ:param æ˜¯å½¢å‚ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹ä¼ å…¥çš„å‚æ•°è¿›è¡Œæ³¨é‡Šã€‚

9.4 åŠŸèƒ½æ‰©å±•

9.4.1 ä¼˜åŒ–è¡€é‡çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºæ•ˆæœ

    def show_status(self):
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp}")

9.4.2 è¡€é‡é—®é¢˜ï¼šä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°çš„æƒ…å†µ

å¦‚ä½•éªŒè¯è¡€é‡è´Ÿæ•°æƒ…å†µï¼Ÿ

ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹å‘ï¼šæ‰©å¤§å‡è¡€çš„èŒƒå›´ï¼Œå°†0.1æ”¹æ‰ï¼›åœ¨è¾“æ‰çš„æ—¶å€™æ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡ã€‚

You lose! Your HP: -1.800000000000023

åŒç†ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç»“æœå‡ºè¾“å‡ºæ•Œäººè¡€é‡ï¼š

You win! Enemy HP: -1

æ­¤å¤–ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¿®æ”¹ while çš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œåªä¿ç•™ç©å®¶ä¸æ­»çš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œç©å®¶ä¸€ç›´æ”»å‡»ï¼Œæ•Œäººå¾ˆå¿«è¡€é‡å˜å¤æ•°ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ­¤æ—¶å¾ªç¯è¿˜æœªç»“æŸï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡ show_status() é˜¶æ®µï¼Œä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°çš„æ•Œäººè¡€é‡ã€‚

Ran's HP â†’ 100
Monster's HP â†’ 80
Attack or Defence (A/D): A
Ran's HP â†’ 70
Monster's HP â†’ 36
Attack or Defence (A/D): A
Ran's HP â†’ 64
Monster's HP â†’ -6
Attack or Defence (A/D): A
Ran's HP â†’ 36
Monster's HP â†’ -32

å¦‚ä½•ä¿®æ”¹è¡€é‡æ˜¯è´Ÿæ•°çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Ÿ

æ€è·¯ï¼šä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™ä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°ï¼Ÿå‡è¡€é‡çš„æ—¶å€™ã€‚

æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ï¼šåˆ¤æ–­ä¼¤å®³å€¼å’Œå‰©ä½™è¡€é‡ï¼Œä¼¤å®³å€¼é«˜ï¼Œè¡€é‡å½’é›¶ï¼Œä¼¤å®³å€¼ä½ï¼Œæ­£å¸¸å‡ï¼š

    def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        if attack_value >= self.hp:
            self.hp = 0
        else:
            self.hp -= attack_value

æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼šå…ˆè¿›è¡Œå‡è¡€ï¼Œè‹¥å‡å‡ºè´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œåˆ™è¿›è¡Œå½’é›¶å¤„ç†ï¼š

    def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        self.hp -= attack_value
        if self.hp <= 0:
            self.hp = 0

æ–¹æ³•ä¸‰ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ max() å‡½æ•°

int(self.hp-attack_value) æ­¤å¤„å¯èƒ½æ˜¯è´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ­£æ•°ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ max() åšåˆ°äº†ä»ä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¸­å–æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¯¥å€¼æ˜¯è´Ÿæ•°çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ€»ä¼šå–åˆ°æœ€å¤§å€¼ 0 ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å®ç°è¡€é‡çš„æ§åˆ¶ã€‚

    def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        """å—åˆ°ä¼¤å®³ï¼ˆå‘ä¸‹å–æ•´é¿å…è¡€é‡æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¿è¯äº†è¡€é‡ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°"""
        self.hp = max(0, int(self.hp-attack_value))

9.4.3 ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥æ§åˆ¶

è¦å¯¹ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°çš„ç©ºæ ¼å’Œå°å†™æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å½“è¾“å…¥é”™è¯¯æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å®ç°é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ï¼š

user_input = input('Attack or Defence (A/D): ').strip().upper()
    while user_input not in ('A', 'D'):
        user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ A æˆ– D').strip().upper()

9.4.4 æ•ŒäººçŠ¶æ€éšæ„

æ•Œäººæ˜¯éšæœºçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œæœ‰å¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ”»å‡»ï¼Œæœ‰å¯èƒ½æ˜¯é˜²å®ˆã€‚å¦‚æœæ•Œäººæ˜¯é˜²å®ˆçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå—åˆ°ç©å®¶ä¼¤å®³å‡åŠã€‚

  1. åˆæ­¥å®ç°
enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            enemy.being_attack(0.5 * player_attack_value)
  1. åœ¨ç©å®¶çš„æ“ä½œä¸­å®ç°

ç©å®¶æ”»å‡»æ—¶å®ç°å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    if user_input == 'A':
        enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_value = 0.5*player.attack()
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            player_attack_value = player.attack()
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)
            
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value)

å½“ç©å®¶é˜²å®ˆæ—¶ï¼Œåº”è¯¥å¦‚ä½•å®ç°ï¼Ÿ

import random

class Creature():
    # ---snip---

player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    # ---snip---

    if user_input == 'A':
        # ---snip---

    elif user_input == 'D':
        enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            print('Both defended, no damage dealt.')
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

# ---snip---

ç›®å‰å®Œæ•´ä»£ç ï¼š

import random

class Creature():
    def __init__(self, name, hp):
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp

    def attack(self):
        attack_value = random.randint(0, 50)
        return attack_value

    def not_dead(self):
        return self.hp > 0

    def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        """å—åˆ°ä¼¤å®³ï¼ˆå‘ä¸‹å–æ•´é¿å…è¡€é‡æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¿è¯äº†è¡€é‡ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°"""
        self.hp = max(0, int(self.hp-attack_value))

    def show_status(self):
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp}")



player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()

    user_input = input('Attack or Defence (A/D): ').strip().upper()
    while user_input not in ('A', 'D'):
        user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ A æˆ– D').strip().upper()



    if user_input == 'A':
        enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_value = 0.5*player.attack()
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            player_attack_value = player.attack()
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value)

    elif user_input == 'D':
        enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            print('Both defended, no damage dealt.')
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)


if player.hp > 0:
    print(f"You win! Your HP: {player.hp}")
else:
    print(f"You lose! ")

9.4.5 æ”¹è‰¯å®ç°

  • å¯ä¼˜åŒ–ç‚¹ä¸€ï¼šç©å®¶è¿›è¡Œæ”»å‡»æ“ä½œæ—¶ï¼Œæ— è®ºæ•Œäººä»€ä¹ˆçŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆæ”»å‡»oré˜²å®ˆï¼‰ï¼Œç©å®¶éƒ½è¦æ”»å‡»ï¼Œæ•Œäººä¸€å®šä¼šå‡è¡€ã€‚

    ä¼˜åŒ–å‰
        if user_input == 'A':
        enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_value = 0.5*player.attack()
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            player_attack_value = player.attack()
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value)
    ä¼˜åŒ–å
        if user_input == 'A':
        enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)
            
        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)

  • å¯ä¼˜åŒ–ç‚¹äºŒï¼šç©å®¶é€‰æ‹©æ”»å‡»åè¦åˆ¤æ–­æ•ŒäººçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œç©å®¶é€‰æ‹©é˜²å®ˆæ—¶ä¹ŸåŒæ ·è¦åˆ¤æ–­æ•ŒäººçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œéƒ½éœ€è¦ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªè¡¨ç¤ºæ•ŒäººçŠ¶æ€çš„å˜é‡ã€‚

    ä¼˜åŒ–å‰
        if user_input == 'A':
        enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)


    elif user_input == 'D':
        enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            print('Both defended, no damage dealt.')
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)
    ä¼˜åŒ–å
    # å°†æ¶‰åŠæ•ŒäººçŠ¶æ€çš„ä»£ç æå‡ºæ¥
    enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
    if user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)


    elif user_input == 'D':
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            print('Both defended, no damage dealt.')
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

å½“æˆ‘ä»¬ä¼˜åŒ–åï¼Œå‘ç°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¼˜åŒ–å…¶å®æ„ä¹‰ä¸å¤§ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åœ¨å®é™…å¼€å‘ä¸­å°±æ˜¯å¦‚æ­¤ï¼Œä½ æ›´æ–°äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„åŠŸèƒ½æˆ–ä»£ç ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ã€ç”¨æˆ·è§‰å¾—æ²¡å¿…è¦ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿæ‡’å¾—æ”¹å›å»ã€‚

ç›®å‰å®Œæ•´ä»£ç ï¼š

import random

class Creature():
    def __init__(self, name, hp):
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp

    def attack(self):
        attack_value = random.randint(0, 50)
        return attack_value

    def not_dead(self):
        return self.hp > 0

    def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        """å—åˆ°ä¼¤å®³ï¼ˆå‘ä¸‹å–æ•´é¿å…è¡€é‡æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¿è¯äº†è¡€é‡ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°"""
        self.hp = max(0, int(self.hp-attack_value))

    def show_status(self):
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp}")



player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()

    user_input = input('Attack or Defence (A/D): ').strip().upper()
    while user_input not in ('A', 'D'):
        user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ A æˆ– D').strip().upper()

    enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
    if user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)


    elif user_input == 'D':
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            print('Both defended, no damage dealt.')
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)


if player.hp > 0:
    print(f"You win! Your HP: {player.hp}")
else:
    print(f"You lose! ")

9.4.6 æ¸¸æˆç­–ç•¥å‡çº§

å½“å‰æ¸¸æˆç­–ç•¥å¹¶ä¸å®Œå¤‡ã€‚

å› ä¸ºç©å®¶é˜²å®ˆæ—¶ï¼Œæ•Œäººå¿…é¡»è¦æ”»å‡»ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä¸¤ä¸ªäººéƒ½é˜²å®ˆã€‚

å› æ­¤ä¼˜åŒ–ä¸ºï¼šç©å®¶é˜²å®ˆï¼Œæ•Œäººå¿…æ”»å‡»ï¼

ç©å®¶é˜²å®ˆæƒ…å†µä¸­çš„ä»£ç å¯ä»¥è¿˜åŸä¸ºå‰é¢çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œé‡Œé¢ä¸å†åŒ…å«åˆ¤æ–­æ•ŒäººçŠ¶æ€çš„æ­¥éª¤ã€‚

    elif user_input == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

å‘ç°ï¼šå¯èƒ½æœ€å¼€å§‹çš„æ˜¯æœ€å¥½çš„ã€‚

ç›®å‰å®Œæ•´ä»£ç ï¼š

import random

class Creature():
    def __init__(self, name, hp):
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp

    def attack(self):
        attack_value = random.randint(0, 50)
        return attack_value

    def not_dead(self):
        return self.hp > 0

    def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        """å—åˆ°ä¼¤å®³ï¼ˆå‘ä¸‹å–æ•´é¿å…è¡€é‡æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¿è¯äº†è¡€é‡ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°"""
        self.hp = max(0, int(self.hp-attack_value))

    def show_status(self):
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp}")



player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()

    user_input = input('Attack or Defence (A/D): ').strip().upper()
    while user_input not in ('A', 'D'):
        user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ A æˆ– D').strip().upper()

    enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
    if user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)


    elif user_input == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)


if player.hp > 0:
    print(f"You win! Your HP: {player.hp}")
else:
    print(f"You lose! ")

9.4.7 ç©å®¶å›è¡€æŠ€èƒ½

å½“ç©å®¶è¡€é‡ä½äº50%æ—¶ï¼Œæç¤ºç©å®¶å¯ä»¥è¾“å…¥â€œHâ€æ¥ä½¿ç”¨æ²»ç–—æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œç›´æ¥å›è¡€ 100% ï¼ˆæ»¡è¡€ï¼‰ã€‚

è¦æ±‚ï¼š

  1. åªèƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼
  2. æ— æ³•éšæ—¶ä½¿ç”¨å›è¡€æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œåªæœ‰åœ¨æç¤ºå‡ºç°æ—¶æ‰èƒ½å¤Ÿä½¿ç”¨ã€‚
  3. è¡€é‡ä½äºä¸€èˆ¬æŒ‰ç…§åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¼ å…¥çš„å‚æ•°å†³å®šï¼Œéšå…¶å˜åŒ–ã€‚

ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šå¢åŠ åˆå§‹è¡€é‡å€¼

ä¸ªäººæ–¹æ³•
player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)
player_initial_hp = player.hp         # è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼ï¼Œæˆç«‹ï¼Œè‹¥æ˜¯å­—å…¸/åˆ—è¡¨åˆ™éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘æ·±æµ…æ‹·è´é—®é¢˜
è€å¸ˆæ–¹æ³•
class Creature():
    def __init__(self, name, hp):
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp
        self.max_hp = hp              # å¢åŠ  max_hp è¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡

ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šç±»é‡Œå¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°

    def heal_full(self):
        """ç›´æ¥å›åˆ°åˆå§‹æ»¡è¡€"""
        self.hp = self.max_hp

ç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ï¼šæ˜¾ç¤ºè¡€é‡çš„å‡½æ•°éšä¹‹å¯ä»¥ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰è¡€é‡/åŸå§‹è¡€é‡ã€‚

    def show_status(self):
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp/self.max_hp}")

ç¬¬å››æ­¥ï¼šå› ä¸ºåªèƒ½æç¤ºä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡ heal_used åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤ºè¿‡äº†ã€‚ä¸ªäººä¿®æ”¹æ—¶çº ç»“çš„é—®é¢˜åœ¨äºï¼Œåœ¨å¾ªç¯å†…è®¾ç½®äº†è¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¾ªç¯æ—¶ä¼šè¢«è¦†ç›–ï¼Œé‡æ–°åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œè§£å†³çš„æ–¹æ³•å°±æ˜¯æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡æ”¾åˆ°å¾ªç¯å¤–é¢ã€‚

player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)
heal_used = False

åé¢å…·ä½“å®ç°è¿‡ç¨‹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

ä¸ªäººä»£ç 
    if (player.hp < player.max_hp*0.5) and (not heal_used):    # åŸæœ¬åŒ…å«2ä¸ªif ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ and çš„ä½¿ç”¨è¿›è¡Œåˆå¹¶
        recover = input('è¡€é‡ä½äº 50% ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¾“å…¥ H ä½¿ç”¨æ²»ç–—æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œç›´æ¥æ¢å¤æ»¡è¡€çŠ¶æ€ï¼š').strip().upper()
        if recover == 'H':
            player.heal_full()
        heal_used = True
è€å¸ˆä»£ç 
# å°†å›è¡€å’Œæ”»å‡»/é˜²å®ˆè¿›è¡Œåˆå¹¶

player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)
heal_used = False       # é™åˆ¶å›è¡€åªèƒ½ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()

    # æ˜¯å¦å‡ºç°æ²»ç–—æç¤ºï¼šä»…å½“å½“å‰è¡€é‡<åˆå§‹å€¼50% å¹¶ä¸”å°šæœªä½¿ç”¨å›è¡€åŠŸèƒ½
    can_heal_now = (not heal_used) and (player.hp < player.max_hp * 0.5)

    if can_heal_now:
        prompt = 'Attack or Defence or Heal (A/D/H): '
        valid_inputs = {'A', 'D', 'H'}
        extra_tip = 'ï¼ˆæç¤ºï¼šç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ H å›æ»¡è¡€ï¼Œä»…æ­¤ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼‰'
        print(extra_tip)

    else:
        prompt = 'Attack or Defence (A/D): '
        valid_inputs = {'A', 'D'}

    user_input = input(prompt).strip().upper()
    while user_input not in valid_inputs:
        user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥: ' + prompt).strip().upper()

    enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])

    if user_input == 'H':
        # åªæœ‰åœ¨ can_heal_now ä¸º True æ—¶æ‰ä¼šè¿›å…¥è¿™é‡Œ
        print('ä½ ä½¿ç”¨äº†æ²»ç–—æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œè¡€é‡å·²ç»å›æ»¡ã€‚')
        player.heal_full()
        heal_used = True

    elif user_input == 'A':

ç›®å‰å®Œæ•´ä»£ç ï¼š

ä¸ªäººå®Œæ•´ä»£ç 
import random

class Creature():
    def __init__(self, name, hp):
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp
        self.max_hp = hp              # è®°å½•åˆå§‹è¡€é‡

    def attack(self):
        attack_value = random.randint(0, 50)
        return attack_value

    def not_dead(self):
        return self.hp > 0

    def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        """å—åˆ°ä¼¤å®³ï¼ˆå‘ä¸‹å–æ•´é¿å…è¡€é‡æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¿è¯äº†è¡€é‡ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°"""
        self.hp = max(0, int(self.hp-attack_value))

    def show_status(self):
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp/self.max_hp}")

    def heal_full(self):
        """ç›´æ¥å›åˆ°åˆå§‹æ»¡è¡€"""
        self.hp = self.max_hp




player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)
heal_used = False

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()

    user_input = input('Attack or Defence (A/D): ').strip().upper()
    while user_input not in ('A', 'D'):
        user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ A æˆ– D').strip().upper()

    enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])
    if user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)


    elif user_input == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)


    if (player.hp < player.max_hp*0.5) and (not heal_used):
        recover = input('è¡€é‡ä½äº 50% ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¾“å…¥ H ä½¿ç”¨æ²»ç–—æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œç›´æ¥æ¢å¤æ»¡è¡€çŠ¶æ€ï¼š').strip().upper()
        if recover == 'H':
            player.heal_full()
        heal_used = True


if player.hp > 0:
    print(f"You win! Your HP: {player.hp}")
else:
    print(f"You lose! ")
è€å¸ˆå®Œæ•´ä»£ç 
import random

class Creature():
    def __init__(self, name, hp):
        self.name = name
        self.hp = hp
        self.max_hp = hp              # è®°å½•åˆå§‹è¡€é‡

    def attack(self):
        attack_value = random.randint(0, 50)
        return attack_value

    def not_dead(self):
        return self.hp > 0

    def being_attack(self, attack_value):
        """å—åˆ°ä¼¤å®³ï¼ˆå‘ä¸‹å–æ•´é¿å…è¡€é‡æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¿è¯äº†è¡€é‡ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°"""
        self.hp = max(0, int(self.hp-attack_value))

    def show_status(self):
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp/self.max_hp}")

    def heal_full(self):
        """ç›´æ¥å›åˆ°åˆå§‹æ»¡è¡€"""
        self.hp = self.max_hp


player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)
heal_used = False       # é™åˆ¶å›è¡€åªèƒ½ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()

    # æ˜¯å¦å‡ºç°æ²»ç–—æç¤ºï¼šä»…å½“å½“å‰è¡€é‡<åˆå§‹å€¼50% å¹¶ä¸”å°šæœªä½¿ç”¨å›è¡€åŠŸèƒ½
    can_heal_now = (not heal_used) and (player.hp < player.max_hp * 0.5)

    if can_heal_now:
        prompt = 'Attack or Defence or Heal (A/D/H): '
        valid_inputs = {'A', 'D', 'H'}
        extra_tip = 'ï¼ˆæç¤ºï¼šç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ H å›æ»¡è¡€ï¼Œä»…æ­¤ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼‰'
        print(extra_tip)

    else:
        prompt = 'Attack or Defence (A/D): '
        valid_inputs = {'A', 'D'}

    user_input = input(prompt).strip().upper()
    while user_input not in valid_inputs:
        user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥: ' + prompt).strip().upper()

    enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])

    if user_input == 'H':
        # åªæœ‰åœ¨ can_heal_now ä¸º True æ—¶æ‰ä¼šè¿›å…¥è¿™é‡Œ
        print('ä½ ä½¿ç”¨äº†æ²»ç–—æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œè¡€é‡å·²ç»å›æ»¡ã€‚')
        player.heal_full()
        heal_used = True

    elif user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)


    elif user_input == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)



if player.hp > 0:
    print(f"You win! Your HP: {player.hp}")
else:
    print(f"You lose! ")

ä½†æ˜¯ä¸Šè¿°è€å¸ˆçš„ä»£ç ä¹Ÿæœ‰ä¸ªå°é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰é€‰æ‹©å›è¡€çš„è¯ï¼Œå°±ä¼šä¸€ç›´æç¤ºå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å›è¡€ã€‚å¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬å¸Œæœ›è¿™ä¸ªæç¤ºå’Œå›è¡€çš„é€‰æ‹©åªå‡ºç°ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯è¿‡è¿™æ‘æ²¡è¿™åº—çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å°† heal_used = True ä»ç©å®¶é€‰æ‹© H çš„åˆ¤æ–­ä¸­æå‡ºæ¥ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ”¾åœ¨æç¤ºå‡ºç°åã€‚

æ­¤å¤–ï¼Œåœ¨å°†å›è¡€åŠŸèƒ½åŠ å…¥æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥ H çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥çš„æç¤ºè¯­ä¸Šè¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

import random


class Creature():
    def __init__(self, hp, name):
        self.hp = hp
        self.max_hp = hp  # è®°å½•åˆå§‹æ»¡è¡€
        self.name = name

    def attack(self):
        return random.randint(0, 50)

    def not_dead(self):
        return self.hp > 0

    def being_attack(self, dmg: float):
        """å—åˆ°ä¼¤å®³ï¼ˆå‘ä¸‹å–æ•´ä»¥é¿å…æµ®ç‚¹ HPï¼‰ï¼Œå¹¶ä¿è¯ HP ä¸ä¼šæ‰åˆ°è´Ÿæ•°ä»¥ä¸‹"""
        self.hp = max(0, int(self.hp - dmg))

    def heal_full(self):
        """ç›´æ¥å›åˆ°åˆå§‹æ»¡è¡€"""
        self.hp = self.max_hp

    def show_status(self):
        # print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp}")
        print(f"{self.name}'s HP â†’ {self.hp}/{self.max_hp}")


heal_used = False  # æ²»ç–—ä»…é™ä¸€æ¬¡

player = Creature(100, "AIæ‚¦åˆ›")
enemy = Creature(80, "Enemy")

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()

    prompt = "Attack or Defence (A/D)ï¼š"

    if (player.hp < player.max_hp * 0.5) and (not heal_used):
        print("ï¼ˆæç¤ºï¼šä½ ç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ H å›æ»¡è¡€ï¼Œä»…æ­¤ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼‰")
        prompt = "Attack or Defence or Heal (A/D/H)ï¼š"

    user_input = input(prompt).strip().upper()
    while user_input not in ("A", "D", "H"):
        user_input = input("è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ A æˆ– Dï¼š").strip().upper()

    enemy_status = ['Attack', 'Defence']
    enemy_choice = random.choice(enemy_status)
    if user_input == "A":
        player_attack_coefficient = 1  # MR å–å
        if enemy_choice == "Defence":
            print(f"{enemy.name} chose to defend!")
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f"{enemy.name} chose to attack!")
            enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)
        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)

    elif user_input == "D":
        enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack() * 0.1
        player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

    elif user_input == "H":
        player.heal_full()
        heal_used = True
        print(f"{player.name} healed to full health!")
        prompt = "Attack or Defence (A/D)ï¼š"

if player.not_dead():
    print("You Win!")
else:
    print("You Lose!")

9.4.8 å›è¡€æŠ€èƒ½ä»£ä»·

å›è¡€æ˜¯æœ‰ä»£ä»·çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœç©å®¶ä½¿ç”¨äº†å›è¡€æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œåç»­æ•Œäººä¸€å®šä¼šæ”»å‡»ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ”»å‡»å°†ç¿»å€ã€‚

å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ•Œäººæ”»å‡»æ—¶ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å›è¡€æŠ€èƒ½æ˜¯å¦ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨äº†ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ”»å‡» ä¹˜2ã€‚

ä¸‹è¿°ä»£ç æ˜¯åœ¨ heal_used = True æ”¾åœ¨è¾“å…¥æ˜¯ H ä¸‹çš„åˆ¤æ–­ä¸­çš„æƒ…å†µï¼š

    if user_input == 'H':
        # åªæœ‰åœ¨ can_heal_now ä¸º True æ—¶æ‰ä¼šè¿›å…¥è¿™é‡Œ
        print('ä½ ä½¿ç”¨äº†æ²»ç–—æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œè¡€é‡å·²ç»å›æ»¡ã€‚')
        player.heal_full()
        heal_used = True

    elif user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
        if enemy_status == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to defend!')
            player_attack_coefficient = 0.5
        else:
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            if heal_used:         # åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å›è¡€æ²»ç–—äº†
                enemy_attack_value = 2 * enemy.attack()
            else:
                enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

        player_attack_value = player.attack()
        enemy.being_attack(player_attack_value * player_attack_coefficient)


    elif user_input == 'D':
            print(f'{enemy.name} chose to attack!')
            if heal_used:         # åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å›è¡€æ²»ç–—äº†
                enemy_attack_value = 2*(0.1*enemy.attack())
            else:
                enemy_attack_value = 0.1*enemy.attack()
            player.being_attack(enemy_attack_value)

å¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬æƒ³è¦æŒ‡å®šâ€œè¿‡è¿™æ‘æ²¡è¿™åº—â€çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåƒæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸Šé¢æåˆ°è¿‡çš„ heal_used = True è¢«æåˆ°å¤–é¢ï¼Œå°±éœ€è¦å°†â€œæç¤ºè¿‡â€å’Œâ€œä½¿ç”¨å›è¡€â€åŒºåˆ†å¼€ï¼Œå› æ­¤éœ€è¦å¼•å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°å˜é‡ heal_penalty_active ï¼Œå…·ä½“ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

player = Creature('Ran',100)
enemy = Creature('Monster',80)
heal_used = False       # é™åˆ¶å›è¡€åªèƒ½ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡
heal_penalty_active = False      # å›è¡€ä»£ä»·æ¿€æ´»çŠ¶æ€

while player.not_dead() and enemy.not_dead():
    player.show_status()
    enemy.show_status()

    # æ˜¯å¦å‡ºç°æ²»ç–—æç¤ºï¼šä»…å½“å½“å‰è¡€é‡<åˆå§‹å€¼50% å¹¶ä¸”å°šæœªä½¿ç”¨å›è¡€åŠŸèƒ½
    can_heal_now = (not heal_used) and (player.hp < player.max_hp * 0.5)

    if can_heal_now:
        prompt = 'Attack or Defence or Heal (A/D/H): '
        valid_inputs = {'A', 'D', 'H'}
        extra_tip = 'ï¼ˆæç¤ºï¼šç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ H å›æ»¡è¡€ï¼Œä»…æ­¤ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼‰'
        print(extra_tip)
        heal_used = True  # è¯´æ˜å›è¡€æç¤ºå‡ºç°äº†ï¼Œä¹‹åä¸ä¼šå†å‡ºç°

    else:
        prompt = 'Attack or Defence (A/D): '
        valid_inputs = {'A', 'D'}

    if heal_penalty_active:
        print('ã€è­¦å‘Šã€‘æ²»ç–—ä»£ä»·ç”Ÿæ•ˆä¸­ï¼Œæ•Œäººå¯¹ä½ çš„ä¼¤å®³ Ã—2 ï¼')


    user_input = input(prompt).strip().upper()
    while user_input not in valid_inputs:
        user_input = input('è¾“å…¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥: ' + prompt).strip().upper()

    # æ•Œäººé€‰æ‹©ï¼ˆè‹¥ç©å®¶é€‰æ‹© D æˆ–è€… H ï¼Œæ•Œäººéƒ½ç›´æ¥æ”»å‡»ï¼‰
    enemy_status = random.choice(['A', 'D'])

    # å½“å‰æ•Œäººä¼¤å®³å€ç‡ï¼ˆæ˜¯å¦ç¿»å€ï¼‰
    def enemy_mul():
        return 2.0 if heal_penalty_active else 1.0

    if user_input == 'H':
        # åªæœ‰åœ¨ can_heal_now ä¸º True æ—¶æ‰ä¼šè¿›å…¥è¿™é‡Œ
        print('ä½ ä½¿ç”¨äº†æ²»ç–—æŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œè¡€é‡å·²ç»å›æ»¡ã€‚')
        player.heal_full()
        heal_penalty_active = True             # è§¦å‘æ²»ç–—ä»£ä»·

        # æ•Œäººå›åˆï¼šç›´æ¥æ”»å‡»ï¼Œå…ˆæ²»ç–—å†æŒ¨æ‰“
        raw_enemy_attack_value = enemy.attack()
        damage = raw_enemy_attack_value * enemy_mul()
        print(f'{enemy.name}æ”»å‡»äº†ä½ ï¼Œé€ æˆ{int(damage)}ç‚¹ä¼¤å®³ï¼ï¼ˆåŸå§‹{int(raw_enemy_attack_value)}Ã—å€ç‡{enemy_mul():.0f}ï¼‰')
        player.being_attack(damage)


    elif user_input == 'A':
        player_attack_coefficient = 1
